348 namespace io

350 // *INDENT-OFF*
351 template<>
352 std::string enum_to_string<butcher_type>( butcher_type data )
353 {
354  switch( data ) {
355  case butcher_type::BLEED: return "BLEED";
356  case butcher_type::DISMEMBER: return "DISMEMBER";
357  case butcher_type::DISSECT: return "DISSECT";
358  case butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS: return "FIELD_DRESS";
359  case butcher_type::FULL: return "FULL";
360  case butcher_type::QUARTER: return "QUARTER";
361  case butcher_type::QUICK: return "QUICK";
362  case butcher_type::SKIN: return "SKIN";
363  case butcher_type::NUM_TYPES: break;
364  }
365  cata_fatal( "Invalid valid_target" );
366 }
367 // *INDENT-ON*

370 
371 static void assign_multi_activity( Character &you, const player_activity &act )
372 {
373  const bool requires_actor = activity_actors::deserialize_functions.find( act.id() ) !=
374  activity_actors::deserialize_functions.end();
375  if( requires_actor ) {
376  // the activity uses `activity_actor` and requires `player_activity::actor` to be set
377  you.assign_activity( player_activity( act ) );
378  } else {
379  // the activity uses the older type of player_activity where `player_activity::actor` is not used
380  you.assign_activity( act.id() );
381  }
382 }
383 
384 bool activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( Character &you )
385 {
386  if( !you.backlog.empty() ) {
387  player_activity &back_act = you.backlog.front();
388  if( back_act.is_multi_type() ) {
389  assign_multi_activity( you, back_act );
390  you.backlog.clear();
391  return true;
392  }
393  }
394  return false;
395 }
396 
397 static bool check_butcher_dissect( const int roll )
398 {
399  // Failure rates for dissection rolls
400  // 100% at roll 0, 66% at roll 1, 50% at roll 2, 40% @ 3, 33% @ 4, 28% @ 5, ... , 16% @ 10
401  // Roll is roughly a rng(0, -3 + 1st_aid + fine_cut_quality + 1/2 electronics + small_dex_bonus)
402  // Roll is reduced by corpse damage level, but to no less then 0
403  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_BUTCHER, "Roll = %i", roll );
404  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_BUTCHER, "Failure chance = %f%%",
405  ( 10.0f / ( 10.0f + roll * 5.0f ) ) * 100.0f );
406  const bool failed = x_in_y( 10, ( 10 + roll * 5 ) );
407  return !failed;
408 }
409 
410 static bool butcher_dissect_item( item &what, const tripoint &pos,
411  const time_point &age, const int roll )
412 {
413  if( roll < 0 ) {
414  return false;
415  }
416  bool success = check_butcher_dissect( roll );
417  map &here = get_map();
418  if( what.is_bionic() && !success ) {
419  item burnt_out_cbm( itype_burnt_out_bionic, age );
420  add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), burnt_out_cbm.tname() );
421  here.add_item( pos, burnt_out_cbm );
422  } else if( success ) {
423  add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), what.tname() );
424  here.add_item( pos, what );
425  }
426  return success;
427 }
428 
429 static void set_up_butchery( player_activity &act, Character &you, butcher_type action )
430 {
431  const int factor = you.max_quality( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER,
432  PICKUP_RANGE );
433 
434  const item &corpse_item = *act.targets.back();
435  const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
436 
437  if( action != butcher_type::DISSECT ) {
438  if( factor == INT_MIN ) {
439  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
440  _( "None of your cutting tools are suitable for butchering." ) );
441  act.set_to_null();
442  return;
443  } else if( factor < 0 && one_in( 3 ) ) {
444  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
445  _( "You don't trust the quality of your tools, but carry on anyway." ) );
446  }
447  }
448 
449  if( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ) {
450  switch( factor ) {
451  case INT_MIN:
452  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "None of your tools are sharp and precise enough to do that." ) );
453  act.set_to_null();
454  return;
455  case 1:
456  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You could use a better tool, but this will do." ) );
457  break;
458  case 2:
459  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This tool is great, but you still would like a scalpel." ) );
460  break;
461  case 3:
462  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You dissect the corpse with a trusty scalpel." ) );
463  break;
464  case 5:
465  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
466  _( "You dissect the corpse with a sophisticated system of surgical grade scalpels." ) );
467  break;
468  }
469  }
470 
471  const std::pair<float, requirement_id> butchery_requirements =
472  corpse.harvest->get_butchery_requirements().get_fastest_requirements( you.crafting_inventory(),
473  corpse.size, action );
474 
475  // Requirements for the various types
476  const requirement_id butchery_requirement = butchery_requirements.second;
477 
478  if( !butchery_requirement->can_make_with_inventory(
479  you.crafting_inventory( you.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ), is_crafting_component ) ) {
480  std::string popup_output = _( "You can't butcher this; you are missing some tools.\n" );
481 
482  for( const std::string &str : butchery_requirement->get_folded_components_list(
483  45, c_light_gray, you.crafting_inventory( you.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ), is_crafting_component ) ) {
484  popup_output += str + '\n';
485  }
486  for( const std::string &str : butchery_requirement->get_folded_tools_list(
487  45, c_light_gray, you.crafting_inventory( you.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) ) {
488  popup_output += str + '\n';
489  }
490 
491  act.set_to_null();
492  popup( popup_output );
493  return;
494  }
495 
496  if( action == butcher_type::BLEED && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_BLED ) ||
497  corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) || corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ||
498  corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ) ) {
499  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This corpse has already been bled." ) );
500  act.targets.pop_back();
501  return;
502  }
503 
504  if( action == butcher_type::DISSECT && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ||
505  corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
506  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
507  _( "It would be futile to dissect this badly damaged corpse." ) );
508  act.targets.pop_back();
509  return;
510  }
511 
512  if( action == butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
513  corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
514  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This corpse is already field dressed." ) );
515  act.targets.pop_back();
516  return;
517  }
518 
519  if( action == butcher_type::SKIN && corpse_item.has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
520  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This corpse is already skinned." ) );
521  act.targets.pop_back();
522  return;
523  }
524 
525  if( action == butcher_type::QUARTER ) {
526  if( corpse.size == creature_size::tiny ) {
527  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This corpse is too small to quarter without damaging." ),
528  corpse.nname() );
529  act.targets.pop_back();
530  return;
531  }
532  if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
533  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This is already quartered." ), corpse.nname() );
534  act.targets.pop_back();
535  return;
536  }
537  if( !( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
538  corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) &&
539  corpse_item.get_mtype()->harvest->has_entry_type( harvest_drop_offal ) ) {
540  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You need to perform field dressing before quartering." ),
541  corpse.nname() );
542  act.targets.pop_back();
543  return;
544  }
545  }
546 
547 
548  const bool is_human = corpse.id == mtype_id::NULL_ID() || ( ( corpse.in_species( species_HUMAN ) ||
549  corpse.in_species( species_FERAL ) ) &&
550  !corpse.in_species( species_ZOMBIE ) );
551 
552  // applies to all butchery actions except for dissections
553  if( is_human && action != butcher_type::DISSECT && !( you.has_flag( json_flag_CANNIBAL ) ||
554  you.has_flag( json_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) || you.has_flag( json_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) ) {
555  //first determine if the butcherer has the dissect_humans proficiency.
556  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_dissect_humans ) ) {
557  //if it's player doing the butchery, ask them first.
558  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
559  if( query_yn(
560  _( "Really desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being by butchering them for meat?" ) ) ) {
561  //give the player a random message showing their disgust and cause morale penalty.
562  switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
563  case 1:
564  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You clench your teeth at the prospect of this gruesome job." ) );
565  break;
566  case 2:
567  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This will haunt you in your dreams." ) );
568  break;
569  case 3:
570  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
571  _( "You try to look away, but this gruesome image will stay on your mind for some time." ) );
572  break;
573  }
574  get_player_character().add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
575  } else {
576  //player has the dissect_humans prof, so they're familiar with dissection. reference this in their refusal to butcher
577  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You were trained for autopsies, not butchery." ) );
578  act.targets.pop_back();
579  return;
580  }
581  } else {
582  //if not the avatar, don't ask, just do it and suffer without comment
583  you.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
584  }
585  } else {
586  //this runs if the butcherer does NOT have prof_dissect_humans
587  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
588  if( query_yn( _( "Would you dare desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being?" ) ) ) {
589  //random message and morale penalty
590  switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
591  case 1:
592  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You clench your teeth at the prospect of this gruesome job." ) );
593  break;
594  case 2:
595  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This will haunt you in your dreams." ) );
596  break;
597  case 3:
598  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
599  _( "You try to look away, but this gruesome image will stay on your mind for some time." ) );
600  break;
601  }
602  get_player_character().add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
603  } else {
604  //player doesn't have dissect_humans, so just give a regular refusal to mess with the corpse
605  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "It needs a coffin, not a knife." ) );
606  act.targets.pop_back();
607  return;
608  }
609  } else {
610  //again, don't complain about it, or inform about it, just do it
611  you.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
612  }
613  }
614  }
615 
616  // applies to only dissections, so that dissect_humans training makes a difference.
617  if( is_human && action == butcher_type::DISSECT && !( you.has_flag( json_flag_CANNIBAL ) ||
618  you.has_flag( json_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) || you.has_flag( json_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) ) {
619  if( you.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_dissect_humans ) ) {
620  //you're either trained for this, densensitized, or both. doesn't bother you.
621  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
622  //this is a dissection, and we are trained for dissection, so no morale penalty, and lighter flavor text.
623  switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
624  case 1:
625  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You grit your teeth and get to work." ) );
626  break;
627  case 2:
628  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
629  _( "The task at hand is unpleasant, but you steel your nerves regardless." ) );
630  break;
631  case 3:
632  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
633  _( "Hopefully whatever you can glean from this autopsy is worth the effort." ) );
634  break;
635  }
636  }
637  //if we're not the avatar, we aren't getting a morale penalty as usual, and no message, so nothing happens
638  } else {
639  //we don't have dissect_humans but are trying to dissect anyways.
640  if( you.is_avatar() ) {
641  if( query_yn( _( "Really dissect the remains of a fellow human being?" ) ) ) {
642  //give us a message indicating we are dissecting without the stomach for it, but not actually butchering. lower morale penalty.
643  switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
644  case 1:
645  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
646  _( "This is nothing like dissecting a frog in biology class. You feel sick inside." ) );
647  break;
648  case 2:
649  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You wonder how anyone manages to do this ghastly work." ) );
650  break;
651  case 3:
652  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
653  _( "The grim nature of your task deeply upsets you, leaving you feeling disgusted with yourself." ) );
654  break;
655  }
656  get_player_character().add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -40, 0, 1_days, 2_hours );
657  } else {
658  //standard refusal to butcher
659  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "It needs a coffin, not a knife." ) );
660  act.targets.pop_back();
661  return;
662  }
663  } else {
664  //if we're not player and don't have dissect_humans, just add morale penalty.
665  you.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -40, 0, 1_days, 2_hours );
666  }
667  }
668  }
669  act.moves_left = butcher_time_to_cut( you, corpse_item, action ) * butchery_requirements.first;
670 
671  // We have a valid target, so preform the full finish function
672  // instead of just selecting the next valid target
673  act.index = false;
674 }
675 
676 int butcher_time_to_cut( Character &you, const item &corpse_item, const butcher_type action )
677 {
678  const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
679  const int factor = you.max_quality( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER,
680  PICKUP_RANGE );
681 
682  int time_to_cut;
683  switch( corpse.size ) {
684  // Time (roughly) in turns to cut up the corpse
685  case creature_size::tiny:
686  time_to_cut = 150;
687  break;
688  case creature_size::small:
689  time_to_cut = 300;
690  break;
691  case creature_size::medium:
692  time_to_cut = 450;
693  break;
694  case creature_size::large:
695  time_to_cut = 600;
696  break;
697  case creature_size::huge:
698  time_to_cut = 1800;
699  break;
700  default:
701  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid creature_size on %s", corpse.nname() );
702  time_to_cut = 450; // default to medium
703  break;
704  }
705 
706  // At factor 0, base 100 time_to_cut remains 100. At factor 50, it's 50 , at factor 75 it's 25
707  time_to_cut *= std::max( 25, 100 - factor );
708 
709  switch( action ) {
710  case butcher_type::QUICK:
711  case butcher_type::BLEED:
712  break;
713  case butcher_type::FULL:
714  if( !corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
715  time_to_cut *= 6;
716  } else {
717  time_to_cut *= 4;
718  }
719  break;
720  case butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS:
721  case butcher_type::SKIN:
722  time_to_cut *= 2;
723  break;
724  case butcher_type::QUARTER:
725  time_to_cut /= 4;
726  if( time_to_cut < 1200 ) {
727  time_to_cut = 1200;
728  }
729  break;
730  case butcher_type::DISMEMBER:
731  time_to_cut /= 10;
732  if( time_to_cut < 600 ) {
733  time_to_cut = 600;
734  }
735  break;
736  case butcher_type::DISSECT:
737  time_to_cut *= 6;
738  break;
739  case butcher_type::NUM_TYPES:
740  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid butcher_type" );
741  break;
742  }
743 
744  if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
745  time_to_cut /= 4;
746  }
747  time_to_cut *= ( 1.0f - ( get_player_character().get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 ) / 10.0f ) );
748  return time_to_cut;
749 }
750 
751 // this function modifies the input weight by its damage level, depending on the bodypart
752 static int corpse_damage_effect( int weight, const harvest_drop_type_id &entry_type,
753  int damage_level )
754 {
755  const float slight_damage = 0.9f;
756  const float damage = 0.75f;
757  const float high_damage = 0.5f;
758  const int destroyed = 0;
759 
760  switch( damage_level ) {
761  case 2:
762  // "damaged"
763  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
764  return std::round( weight * damage );
765  }
766  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
767  return std::round( weight * damage );
768  }
769  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
770  return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
771  }
772  break;
773  case 3:
774  // "mangled"
775  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
776  return destroyed;
777  }
778  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
779  return std::round( weight * high_damage );
780  }
781  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_bone ) {
782  return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
783  }
784  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
785  return std::round( weight * damage );
786  }
787  break;
788  case 4:
789  // "pulped"
790  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
791  return destroyed;
792  }
793  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
794  return destroyed;
795  }
796  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_bone ) {
797  return std::round( weight * damage );
798  }
799  if( entry_type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
800  return std::round( weight * high_damage );
801  }
802  break;
803  default:
804  // "bruised" modifier is almost impossible to avoid; also includes no modifier (zero damage)
805  break;
806  }
807  return weight;
808 }
809 
810 static int butchery_dissect_skill_level( Character &you, int tool_quality,
811  const harvest_drop_type_id &htype )
812 {
813  // DISSECT has special case factor calculation and results.
814  if( htype.is_valid() ) {
815  float sk_total = 0;
816  int sk_count = 0;
817  for( const skill_id &sk : htype->get_harvest_skills() ) {
818  sk_total += you.get_average_skill_level( sk );
819  sk_count++;
820  }
821  return round( ( sk_total + tool_quality ) / ( sk_count > 0 ? sk_count : 1 ) );
822  }
823  return round( you.get_average_skill_level( skill_survival ) );
824 }
825 
826 static int roll_butchery_dissect( int skill_level, int dex, int tool_quality )
827 {
828  double skill_shift = 0.0;
829  ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases butcher rolls
830  skill_shift += rng_float( 0, skill_level - 3 );
831  ///\EFFECT_DEX >8 randomly increases butcher rolls, slightly, <8 decreases
832  skill_shift += rng_float( 0, dex - 8 ) / 4.0;
833 
834  if( tool_quality < 0 ) {
835  skill_shift -= rng_float( 0, -tool_quality / 5.0 );
836  } else {
837  skill_shift += std::min( tool_quality, 4 );
838  }
839 
840  return static_cast<int>( std::round( skill_shift ) );
841 }
842 
843 // A number between 0 and 1 that represents how much usable material can be harvested
844 // as a fraction of the maximum possible amount.
845 static double butchery_dissect_yield_mult( int skill_level, int dex, int tool_quality )
846 {
847  const double skill_score = skill_level / 10.0;
848  const double tool_score = ( tool_quality + 50.0 ) / 100.0;
849  const double dex_score = dex / 20.0;
850  return 0.5 * clamp( skill_score, 0.0, 1.0 ) +
851  0.3 * clamp( tool_score, 0.0, 1.0 ) +
852  0.2 * clamp( dex_score, 0.0, 1.0 );
853 }
854 
855 static std::vector<item> create_charge_items( const itype *drop, int count,
856  const harvest_entry &entry, const item *corpse_item, const Character &you )
857 {
858  std::vector<item> objs;
859  while( count > 0 ) {
860  item obj( drop, calendar::turn, 1 );
861  obj.charges = std::min( count, DEFAULT_TILE_VOLUME / obj.volume() );
862  count -= obj.charges;
863 
864  if( obj.has_temperature() ) {
865  obj.set_item_temperature( corpse_item->temperature );
866  if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
867  obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
868  }
869  }
870  for( const flag_id &flg : entry.flags ) {
871  obj.set_flag( flg );
872  }
873  for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
874  obj.faults.emplace( flt );
875  }
876  if( !you.backlog.empty() && you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
877  obj.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
878  }
879  objs.push_back( obj );
880  }
881  return objs;
882 }
883 
884 // Returns false if the calling function should abort
885 static bool butchery_drops_harvest( item *corpse_item, const mtype &mt, Character &you,
886  butcher_type action )
887 {
888  const int tool_quality = you.max_quality( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE :
889  qual_BUTCHER, PICKUP_RANGE );
890 
891  //all BUTCHERY types - FATAL FAILURE
892  if( action != butcher_type::DISSECT &&
893  roll_butchery_dissect( round( you.get_average_skill_level( skill_survival ) ), you.dex_cur,
894  tool_quality ) <= ( -15 ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
895  return false;
896  }
897 
898  you.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, mt.harvest->message() );
899  int monster_weight = to_gram( mt.weight );
900  monster_weight += std::round( monster_weight * rng_float( -0.1, 0.1 ) );
901  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
902  monster_weight *= 0.95;
903  }
904  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) ) {
905  monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
906  if( action != butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS ) {
907  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
908  _( "You salvage what you can from the corpse, but it is badly damaged." ) );
909  }
910  }
911  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_UNDERFED ) ) {
912  monster_weight = std::round( 0.9 * monster_weight );
913  if( action != butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS && action != butcher_type::SKIN &&
914  action != butcher_type::DISSECT ) {
915  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
916  _( "The corpse looks a little underweight" ) );
917  }
918  }
919  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
920  monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
921  }
922  const int entry_count = ( action == butcher_type::DISSECT &&
923  !mt.dissect.is_empty() ) ? mt.dissect->get_all().size() : mt.harvest->get_all().size();
924  int monster_weight_remaining = monster_weight;
925  int practice = 0;
926 
927  if( mt.harvest.is_null() ) {
928  debugmsg( "ERROR: %s has no harvest entry.", mt.id.c_str() );
929  return false;
930  }
931 
932  if( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ) {
933  int dissectable_practice = 0;
934  int dissectable_num = 0;
935  for( item *item : corpse_item->all_items_top( pocket_type::CORPSE ) ) {
936  dissectable_num++;
937  const int skill_level = butchery_dissect_skill_level( you, tool_quality,
938  item->dropped_from );
939  const int butchery = roll_butchery_dissect( skill_level, you.dex_cur, tool_quality );
940  dissectable_practice += ( 4 + butchery );
941  int roll = butchery - corpse_item->damage_level();
942  roll = roll < 0 ? 0 : roll;
943  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_BUTCHER, "Roll penalty for corpse damage = %s",
944  0 - corpse_item->damage_level() );
945  butcher_dissect_item( *item, you.pos(), calendar::turn, roll );
946  }
947  if( dissectable_num > 0 ) {
948  practice += dissectable_practice / dissectable_num;
949  }
950  }
951 
952  map &here = get_map();
953  for( const harvest_entry &entry : ( action == butcher_type::DISSECT &&
954  !mt.dissect.is_empty() ) ? *mt.dissect : *mt.harvest ) {
955  const int skill_level = butchery_dissect_skill_level( you, tool_quality, entry.type );
956  const int butchery = roll_butchery_dissect( skill_level, you.dex_cur, tool_quality );
957  practice += ( 4 + butchery ) / entry_count;
958  const float min_num = entry.base_num.first + butchery * entry.scale_num.first;
959  const float max_num = entry.base_num.second + butchery * entry.scale_num.second;
960 
961  int roll = 0;
962  // mass_ratio will override the use of base_num, scale_num, and max
963  if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
964  roll = static_cast<int>( std::round( entry.mass_ratio * monster_weight ) );
965  roll = corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level() );
966  } else {
967  roll = std::min<int>( entry.max, std::round( rng_float( min_num, max_num ) ) );
968  // will not give less than min_num defined in the JSON
969  roll = std::max<int>( corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level() ),
970  entry.base_num.first );
971  }
972 
973  itype_id drop_id = itype_id::NULL_ID();
974  const itype *drop = nullptr;
975  if( entry.type->is_itype() ) {
976  drop_id = itype_id( entry.drop );
977  drop = item::find_type( drop_id );
978  }
979 
980  // Check if monster was gibbed, and handle accordingly
981  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) && ( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh ||
982  entry.type == harvest_drop_bone ) ) {
983  roll /= 2;
984  }
985  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_UNDERFED ) && ( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh ) ) {
986  roll /= 1.6;
987  }
988 
989  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) && entry.type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
990  roll = 0;
991  }
992 
993  // QUICK BUTCHERY
994  if( action == butcher_type::QUICK ) {
995  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
996  roll /= 4;
997  } else if( entry.type == harvest_drop_bone ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
998  roll /= 2;
999  } else if( corpse_item->get_mtype()->size >= creature_size::medium &&
1000  entry.type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
1001  roll /= 2;
1002  } else if( entry.type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
1003  roll /= 5;
1004  } else {
1005  continue;
1006  }
1007  }
1008  // RIP AND TEAR
1009  if( action == butcher_type::DISMEMBER ) {
1010  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
1011  roll /= 6;
1012  } else {
1013  continue;
1014  }
1015  }
1016  // field dressing ignores skin, flesh, and blood
1017  if( action == butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS ) {
1018  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_bone ) {
1019  roll = rng( 0, roll / 2 );
1020  }
1021  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh ) {
1022  continue;
1023  }
1024  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
1025  continue;
1026  }
1027  }
1028 
1029  // you only get the blood from bleeding
1030  if( action == butcher_type::BLEED ) {
1031  if( entry.type != harvest_drop_blood ) {
1032  continue;
1033  }
1034  }
1035 
1036  // you only get the skin from skinning
1037  if( action == butcher_type::SKIN ) {
1038  if( entry.type != harvest_drop_skin ) {
1039  continue;
1040  }
1041  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1042  roll = rng( 0, roll );
1043  }
1044  }
1045 
1046  // field dressing removed innards and bones from meatless limbs
1047  if( ( action == butcher_type::FULL || action == butcher_type::QUICK ) &&
1048  corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ) {
1049  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
1050  continue;
1051  }
1052  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_bone ) {
1053  roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1054  }
1055  }
1056  // unskillfull field dressing may damage the skin, meat, and other parts
1057  if( ( action == butcher_type::FULL || action == butcher_type::QUICK ) &&
1058  corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1059  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_offal ) {
1060  continue;
1061  }
1062  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_bone ) {
1063  roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1064  }
1065  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_flesh || entry.type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
1066  roll = rng( 0, roll );
1067  }
1068  }
1069  // quartering ruins skin
1070  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
1071  if( entry.type == harvest_drop_skin ) {
1072  //not continue to show fail effect
1073  roll = 0;
1074  } else {
1075  roll /= 4;
1076  }
1077  }
1078 
1079  if( drop != nullptr ) {
1080  // divide total dropped weight by drop's weight to get amount
1081  if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
1082  // apply skill before converting to items, but only if mass_ratio is defined
1083  roll *= butchery_dissect_yield_mult( skill_level, you.dex_cur, tool_quality );
1084  monster_weight_remaining -= roll;
1085  roll = std::ceil( static_cast<double>( roll ) /
1086  to_gram( drop->weight ) );
1087  } else {
1088  monster_weight_remaining -= roll * to_gram( drop->weight );
1089  }
1090 
1091  const translation msg = action == butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS ?
1092  entry.type->field_dress_msg( roll > 0 ) :
1093  action == butcher_type::QUICK || action == butcher_type::FULL ||
1094  action == butcher_type::DISMEMBER ? entry.type->butcher_msg( roll > 0 ) : translation();
1095  if( !msg.empty() ) {
1096  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, msg.translated() );
1097  }
1098 
1099  if( roll <= 0 ) {
1100  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You fail to harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( 1 ) );
1101  continue;
1102  }
1103  if( drop->phase == phase_id::LIQUID ) {
1104  item obj( drop, calendar::turn, roll );
1105  if( obj.has_temperature() ) {
1106  obj.set_item_temperature( corpse_item->temperature );
1107  if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1108  obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1109  }
1110  }
1111  for( const flag_id &flg : entry.flags ) {
1112  obj.set_flag( flg );
1113  }
1114  for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1115  obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1116  }
1117 
1118  // TODO: smarter NPC liquid handling
1119  // If we're not bleeding the animal we don't care about the blood being wasted
1120  if( you.is_npc() || action != butcher_type::BLEED ) {
1121  drop_on_map( you, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { obj }, you.pos_bub() );
1122  } else {
1123  liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( obj, 1 );
1124  }
1125  } else if( drop->count_by_charges() ) {
1126  std::vector<item> objs = create_charge_items( drop, roll, entry, corpse_item, you );
1127  for( item &obj : objs ) {
1128  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), obj );
1129  }
1130  } else {
1131  item obj( drop, calendar::turn );
1132  obj.set_mtype( &mt );
1133  if( obj.has_temperature() ) {
1134  obj.set_item_temperature( corpse_item->temperature );
1135  if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1136  obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1137  }
1138  }
1139  for( const flag_id &flg : entry.flags ) {
1140  obj.set_flag( flg );
1141  }
1142  for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1143  obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1144  }
1145  if( !you.backlog.empty() && you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1146  obj.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
1147  }
1148  for( int i = 0; i != roll; ++i ) {
1149  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), obj );
1150  }
1151  }
1152  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( roll ) );
1153  }
1154  practice++;
1155  }
1156  // 20% of the original corpse weight is not an item, but liquid gore
1157  monster_weight_remaining -= monster_weight / 5;
1158  // add the remaining unusable weight as rotting garbage
1159  if( monster_weight_remaining > 0 && action != butcher_type::BLEED ) {
1160  if( action == butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS ) {
1161  // 25% of the corpse weight is what's removed during field dressing
1162  monster_weight_remaining -= monster_weight * 3 / 4;
1163  } else if( action == butcher_type::SKIN ) {
1164  monster_weight_remaining -= monster_weight * 0.85;
1165  } else {
1166  // a carcass is 75% of the weight of the unmodified creature's weight
1167  if( ( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
1168  corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) &&
1169  !corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
1170  monster_weight_remaining -= monster_weight / 4;
1171  } else if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
1172  monster_weight_remaining -= ( monster_weight - ( monster_weight * 3 / 4 / 4 ) );
1173  }
1174  if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
1175  monster_weight_remaining -= monster_weight * 0.15;
1176  }
1177  }
1178  const itype_id &leftover_id = mt.harvest->leftovers;
1179  const int item_charges = monster_weight_remaining / to_gram( item::find_type(
1180  leftover_id )->weight );
1181  if( item_charges > 0 ) {
1182  item ruined_parts( leftover_id, calendar::turn );
1183  ruined_parts.set_mtype( &mt );
1184  ruined_parts.set_item_temperature( corpse_item->temperature );
1185  ruined_parts.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1186  if( !you.backlog.empty() && you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1187  ruined_parts.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
1188  }
1189  for( int i = 0; i < item_charges; ++i ) {
1190  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), ruined_parts );
1191  }
1192  }
1193  }
1194 
1195  if( action == butcher_type::DISSECT ) {
1196  you.practice( skill_firstaid, std::max( 0, practice ), mt.size + std::min( tool_quality, 3 ) + 2 );
1197  mt.families.practice_dissect( you );
1198  } else {
1199  you.practice( skill_survival, std::max( 0, practice ), std::max( mt.size - creature_size::medium,
1200  0 ) + 4 );
1201  }
1202 
1203  // after this point, if there was a liquid handling from the harvest,
1204  // and the liquid handling was interrupted, then the activity was canceled,
1205  // therefore operations on this activity's targets and values may be invalidated.
1206  // reveal hidden items / hidden content
1207  if( action != butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS && action != butcher_type::SKIN &&
1208  action != butcher_type::BLEED ) {
1209  for( item *content : corpse_item->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
1210  if( ( roll_butchery_dissect( round( you.get_average_skill_level( skill_survival ) ), you.dex_cur,
1211  tool_quality ) + 10 ) * 5 > rng( 0, 100 ) ) {
1212  //~ %1$s - item name, %2$s - monster name
1213  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You discover a %1$s in the %2$s!" ), content->tname(),
1214  corpse_item->get_mtype()->nname() );
1215  here.add_item_or_charges( you.pos(), *content );
1216  } else if( content->is_bionic() ) {
1217  here.spawn_item( you.pos(), itype_burnt_out_bionic, 1, 0, calendar::turn );
1218  }
1219  }
1220  }
1221 
1222  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
1223  return true;
1224 }
1225 
1226 static void butchery_quarter( item *corpse_item, const Character &you )
1227 {
1228  corpse_item->set_flag( flag_QUARTERED );
1229  you.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1230  _( "You roughly slice the corpse of %s into four parts and set them aside." ),
1231  corpse_item->get_mtype()->nname() );
1232  map &here = get_map();
1233  tripoint pos = you.pos();
1234 
1235  // 4 quarters (one exists, add 3, flag does the rest)
1236  for( int i = 1; i <= 3; i++ ) {
1237  here.add_item_or_charges( pos, *corpse_item, true );
1238  }
1239 }
1240 
1241 void activity_handlers::butcher_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1242 {
1243  // No targets means we are done
1244  if( act->targets.empty() ) {
1245  act->set_to_null();
1246  resume_for_multi_activities( *you );
1247  return;
1248  }
1249 
1250  item_location target = act->targets.back();
1251 
1252  // Corpses can disappear (rezzing!), so check for that
1253  if( !target || !target->is_corpse() ) {
1254  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no corpse to butcher!" ) );
1255  act->set_to_null();
1256  return;
1257  }
1258 
1259  butcher_type action = butcher_type::QUICK;
1260  if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER ) {
1261  action = butcher_type::QUICK;
1262  } else if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER_FULL ) {
1263  action = butcher_type::FULL;
1264  } else if( act->id() == ACT_FIELD_DRESS ) {
1265  action = butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS;
1266  } else if( act->id() == ACT_QUARTER ) {
1267  action = butcher_type::QUARTER;
1268  } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISSECT ) {
1269  action = butcher_type::DISSECT;
1270  } else if( act->id() == ACT_BLEED ) {
1271  action = butcher_type::BLEED;
1272  } else if( act->id() == ACT_SKIN ) {
1273  action = butcher_type::SKIN;
1274  } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISMEMBER ) {
1275  action = butcher_type::DISMEMBER;
1276  }
1277 
1278  // index is a bool that determines if we are ready to start the next target
1279  if( act->index ) {
1280  set_up_butchery( *act, *you, action );
1281  return;
1282  }
1283 
1284  item &corpse_item = *target;
1285  const mtype *corpse = corpse_item.get_mtype();
1286  const field_type_id type_blood = corpse->bloodType();
1287  const field_type_id type_gib = corpse->gibType();
1288 
1289  // Dump items from the "container" before destroying it.
1290  // Presumably, the character would be doing this while setting up for butchering.
1291  corpse_item.spill_contents( target.position() );
1292 
1293  if( action == butcher_type::QUARTER ) {
1294  butchery_quarter( &corpse_item, *you );
1295  act->index = true;
1296  return;
1297  }
1298 
1299  map &here = get_map();
1300  if( action == butcher_type::DISMEMBER ) {
1301  here.add_splatter( type_gib, you->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1302  }
1303 
1304  // all action types - yields
1305  if( !butchery_drops_harvest( &corpse_item, *corpse, *you, action ) ) {
1306  // FATAL FAILURE
1307  add_msg( m_warning, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_dissect_failed" ).value_or(
1308  translation() ).translated() );
1309 
1310  // Remove the target from the map
1311  target.remove_item();
1312  act->targets.pop_back();
1313 
1314  here.add_splatter( type_gib, you->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1315  here.add_splatter( type_blood, you->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1316  for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1317  here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, you->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( you->pos(),
1318  corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1319  here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, you->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( you->pos(),
1320  corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1321  }
1322 
1323  // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one
1324  act->index = true;
1325  return;
1326  }
1327 
1328  //end messages and effects
1329  switch( action ) {
1330  case butcher_type::QUARTER:
1331  break;
1332  case butcher_type::QUICK:
1333  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_quick_butcher" ).value_or(
1334  translation() ).translated() );
1335  // Remove the target from the map
1336  target.remove_item();
1337  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1338  act->targets.pop_back();
1339  }
1340  break;
1341  case butcher_type::FULL:
1342  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_full_butcher" ).value_or(
1343  translation() ).translated() );
1344 
1345  // Remove the target from the map
1346  target.remove_item();
1347  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1348  act->targets.pop_back();
1349  }
1350  break;
1351  case butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS: {
1352  bool success = roll_butchery_dissect( round( you->get_average_skill_level( skill_survival ) ),
1353  you->dex_cur,
1354  you->max_quality( qual_BUTCHER, PICKUP_RANGE ) ) > 0;
1355  add_msg( success ? m_good : m_warning,
1356  SNIPPET.random_from_category( success ? "harvest_drop_default_field_dress_success" :
1357  "harvest_drop_default_field_dress_failed" ).value_or( translation() ).translated() );
1358  corpse_item.set_flag( success ? flag_FIELD_DRESS : flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED );
1359  here.add_splatter( type_gib, you->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1360  here.add_splatter( type_blood, you->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1361  for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1362  here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, you->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( you->pos(),
1363  corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1364  here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, you->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( you->pos(),
1365  corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1366  }
1367  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1368  act->targets.pop_back();
1369  }
1370  break;
1371  }
1372  case butcher_type::SKIN:
1373  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_skinning" ).value_or(
1374  translation() ).translated() );
1375  corpse_item.set_flag( flag_SKINNED );
1376  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1377  act->targets.pop_back();
1378  }
1379  break;
1380  case butcher_type::BLEED:
1381  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_bleed" ).value_or(
1382  translation() ).translated() );
1383  corpse_item.set_flag( flag_BLED );
1384  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1385  act->targets.pop_back();
1386  }
1387  break;
1388  case butcher_type::DISMEMBER:
1389  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_dismember" ).value_or(
1390  translation() ).translated() );
1391  // Remove the target from the map
1392  target.remove_item();
1393  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1394  act->targets.pop_back();
1395  }
1396  break;
1397  case butcher_type::DISSECT:
1398  add_msg( m_good, SNIPPET.random_from_category( "harvest_drop_default_dissect_success" ).value_or(
1399  translation() ).translated() );
1400 
1401  // Remove the target from the map
1402  target.remove_item();
1403  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1404  act->targets.pop_back();
1405  }
1406  break;
1407  case butcher_type::NUM_TYPES:
1408  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid butcher_type" );
1409  break;
1410  }
1411 
1412  you->recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
1413 
1414  get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_butchered_corpse>( you->getID(),
1415  corpse_item.get_mtype()->id, act->id().str() );
1416 
1417  // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one (for example if multibutchering)
1418  act->index = true;
1419  // if it's mutli-tile butchering, then restart the backlog.
1420  resume_for_multi_activities( *you );
1421 }
1422 
1423 void activity_handlers::fill_liquid_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1424 {
1425  player_activity &act_ref = *act;
1426  try {
1427  // 1. Gather the source item.
1428  vehicle *source_veh = nullptr;
1429  const tripoint source_pos = act_ref.coords.at( 0 );
1430  map &here = get_map();
1431  map_stack source_stack = here.i_at( source_pos );
1432  map_stack::iterator on_ground;
1433  monster *source_mon = nullptr;
1434  item liquid;
1435  const liquid_source_type source_type = static_cast<liquid_source_type>( act_ref.values.at( 0 ) );
1436  int part_num = -1;
1437  int veh_charges = 0;
1438  switch( source_type ) {
1439  case liquid_source_type::VEHICLE:
1440  source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( source_pos ) );
1441  if( source_veh == nullptr ) {
1442  throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1443  }
1444  deserialize_from_string( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1445  part_num = static_cast<int>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1446  veh_charges = liquid.charges;
1447  break;
1448  case liquid_source_type::INFINITE_MAP:
1449  deserialize_from_string( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1450  liquid.charges = item::INFINITE_CHARGES;
1451  break;
1452  case liquid_source_type::MAP_ITEM:
1453  if( static_cast<size_t>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) ) >= source_stack.size() ) {
1454  throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source item on ground for liquid transfer" );
1455  }
1456  on_ground = source_stack.begin();
1457  std::advance( on_ground, act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1458  liquid = *on_ground;
1459  break;
1460  case liquid_source_type::MONSTER:
1461  Creature *c = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( source_pos );
1462  source_mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( c );
1463  if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1464  debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
1465  act_ref.set_to_null();
1466  }
1467  deserialize_from_string( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1468  liquid.charges = 1;
1469  break;
1470  }
1471 
1472  static const units::volume volume_per_second = units::from_liter( 4.0F / 6.0F );
1473  const int charges_per_second = std::max( 1, liquid.charges_per_volume( volume_per_second ) );
1474  liquid.charges = std::min( charges_per_second, liquid.charges );
1475  const int original_charges = liquid.charges;
1476  if( liquid.has_temperature() && units::to_joule_per_gram( liquid.specific_energy ) < 0 ) {
1477  liquid.set_item_temperature( std::max( get_weather().get_temperature( you->pos() ),
1478  temperatures::cold ) );
1479  }
1480 
1481  // 2. Transfer charges.
1482  const vehicle *veh = nullptr;
1483  size_t part;
1484  switch( static_cast<liquid_target_type>( act_ref.values.at( 2 ) ) ) {
1485  case liquid_target_type::VEHICLE: {
1486  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) );
1487  if( act_ref.values.size() > 4 && vp ) {
1488  const vpart_reference vpr( vp->vehicle(), act_ref.values[4] );
1489  veh = &vp->vehicle();
1490  part = act_ref.values[4];
1491  if( source_veh &&
1492  source_veh->fuel_left( liquid.typeId(), ( veh ? std::function<bool( const vehicle_part & )> { [&]( const vehicle_part & pa )
1493  {
1494  return &veh->part( part ) != &pa;
1495  }
1496  } : return_true<const vehicle_part &> ) ) <= 0 ) {
1497  act_ref.set_to_null();
1498  return;
1499  }
1500  you->pour_into( vpr, liquid );
1501 
1502  } else {
1503  throw std::runtime_error( "could not find target vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1504  }
1505  break;
1506  }
1507  case liquid_target_type::CONTAINER:
1508  you->pour_into( act_ref.targets.at( 0 ), liquid, true );
1509  break;
1510  case liquid_target_type::MAP:
1511  if( iexamine::has_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) ) ) {
1512  iexamine::pour_into_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1513  } else {
1514  here.add_item_or_charges( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1515  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pour %1$s onto the ground." ), liquid.tname() );
1516  liquid.charges = 0;
1517  }
1518  break;
1519  case liquid_target_type::MONSTER:
1520  liquid.charges = 0;
1521  break;
1522  }
1523 
1524  const int removed_charges = original_charges - liquid.charges;
1525  if( removed_charges == 0 ) {
1526  // Nothing has been transferred, target must be full.
1527  act_ref.set_to_null();
1528  return;
1529  }
1530 
1531  // 3. Remove charges from source.
1532  switch( source_type ) {
1533  case liquid_source_type::VEHICLE:
1534  if( part_num != -1 ) {
1535  const vehicle_part &pt = source_veh->part( part_num );
1536  if( pt.is_leaking() && !pt.ammo_remaining() ) {
1537  act_ref.set_to_null(); // leaky tank spilled while we were transferring
1538  return;
1539  }
1540  source_veh->drain( part_num, removed_charges );
1541  liquid.charges = veh_charges - removed_charges;
1542  // If there's no liquid left in this tank we're done, otherwise
1543  // we need to update our liquid serialization to reflect how
1544  // many charges are actually left for the next time we come
1545  // around this loop.
1546  if( !liquid.charges ) {
1547  act_ref.set_to_null();
1548  } else {
1549  if( act_ref.str_values.empty() ) {
1550  act_ref.str_values.emplace_back( );
1551  }
1552  act_ref.str_values[0] = serialize( liquid );
1553  }
1554  } else {
1555  source_veh->drain( liquid.typeId(), removed_charges, ( veh ? std::function<bool( vehicle_part & )> { [&]( vehicle_part & pa )
1556  {
1557  return &veh->part( part ) != &pa;
1558  }
1559  } : return_true<vehicle_part &> ) );
1560  }
1561  break;
1562  case liquid_source_type::MAP_ITEM:
1563  on_ground->charges -= removed_charges;
1564  if( on_ground->charges <= 0 ) {
1565  source_stack.erase( on_ground );
1566  if( here.ter( source_pos )->has_examine( iexamine::gaspump ) ) {
1567  add_msg( _( "With a clang and a shudder, the %s pump goes silent." ),
1568  liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1569  } else if( here.furn( source_pos )->has_examine( iexamine::fvat_full ) ) {
1570  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the vat." ),
1571  liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1572  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( source_pos );
1573  if( items_here.empty() ) {
1574  if( here.furn( source_pos ) == furn_f_fvat_wood_full ) {
1575  here.furn_set( source_pos, furn_f_fvat_wood_empty );
1576  } else {
1577  here.furn_set( source_pos, furn_f_fvat_empty );
1578  }
1579  }
1580  } else if( here.furn( source_pos )->has_examine( iexamine::compost_full ) ) {
1581  add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the tank." ),
1582  liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1583  map_stack items_here = here.i_at( source_pos );
1584  if( items_here.empty() ) {
1585  if( here.furn( source_pos ) == furn_f_compost_full ) {
1586  here.furn_set( source_pos, furn_f_compost_empty );
1587  }
1588  }
1589  }
1590  act_ref.set_to_null();
1591  }
1592  break;
1593  case liquid_source_type::INFINITE_MAP:
1594  // nothing, the liquid source is infinite
1595  break;
1596  case liquid_source_type::MONSTER:
1597  // liquid source charges handled in monexamine::milk_source
1598  if( liquid.charges == 0 ) {
1599  act_ref.set_to_null();
1600  }
1601  break;
1602  }
1603 
1604  if( removed_charges < original_charges ) {
1605  // Transferred less than the available charges -> target must be full
1606  act_ref.set_to_null();
1607  }
1608 
1609  } catch( const std::runtime_error &err ) {
1610  debugmsg( "error in activity data: \"%s\"", err.what() );
1611  act_ref.set_to_null();
1612  return;
1613  }
1614 }
1615 
1616 // Repurposing the activity's index to convey the number of friends participating
1617 void activity_handlers::generic_game_turn_handler( player_activity *act, Character *you,
1618  int morale_bonus, int morale_max_bonus )
1619 {
1620  // Consume battery charges for every minute spent playing
1621  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1622  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1623  item &game_item = *act->targets.front();
1624  int req = game_item.ammo_required();
1625  bool fail = req > 0 && game_item.ammo_consume( req, tripoint_zero, you ) == 0;
1626  if( fail ) {
1627  act->moves_left = 0;
1628  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
1629  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), game_item.tname() );
1630  }
1631  return;
1632  }
1633  }
1634  if( act->index > 0 && act->name.find( "with friends" ) != std::string::npos ) {
1635  // 1 friend -> x1.2, 2 friends -> x1.4, 3 friends -> x1.6 ...
1636  float mod = std::sqrt( ( act->index * 0.5f ) + 0.5f ) + 0.2f;
1637  morale_bonus = std::ceil( morale_bonus * mod );
1638  // half mult for max bonus
1639  mod = 1.f + ( mod - 1.f ) * 0.5f;
1640  morale_max_bonus *= mod;
1641  }
1642  // Playing alone - 1 points/min, almost 2 hours to fill
1643  you->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, morale_bonus, morale_max_bonus );
1644  }
1645 }
1646 
1647 // Repurposing the activity's index to convey the number of friends participating
1648 void activity_handlers::generic_game_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1649 {
1650  // Apply small bonus with diminishing returns for playing with friends
1651  if( act->index > 0 && act->name.find( "with friends" ) != std::string::npos ) {
1652  float mod = 1.f;
1653  float acc = 0.4f;
1654  for( int i = act->index; i > 0; i-- ) {
1655  mod += acc;
1656  acc *= acc;
1657  }
1658  if( !act->values.empty() && act->values[0] == you->getID().get_value() ) {
1659  // A winner is you! Feel more happy!
1660  mod *= 1.5f;
1661  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You won!" ) );
1662  you->add_msg_if_npc( m_good, _( "<npcname> won!" ) );
1663  }
1664  you->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, 4 * mod );
1665  }
1666  act->set_to_null();
1667 }

1690 void activity_handlers::pickaxe_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1691 {
1692  map &here = get_map();
1693  const tripoint pos( here.getlocal( act->placement ) );
1694  // Invalidate the activity early to prevent a query from mod_pain()
1695  act->set_to_null();
1696  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
1697  const int helpersize = get_player_character().get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 );
1698  if( here.is_bashable( pos ) && here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SUPPORTS_ROOF, pos ) &&
1699  here.ter( pos ) != ter_t_tree ) {
1700  // Tunneling through solid rock is sweaty, backbreaking work
1701  // Betcha wish you'd opted for the J-Hammer
1702  if( you->has_trait( trait_STOCKY_TROGLO ) ) {
1703  you->mod_pain( std::max( 0, ( 1 * static_cast<int>( rng( 0, 3 ) ) ) - helpersize ) );
1704  } else {
1705  you->mod_pain( std::max( 0, ( 2 * static_cast<int>( rng( 1, 3 ) ) ) - helpersize ) );
1706  }
1707  }
1708  }
1709  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1710  _( "You finish digging." ),
1711  _( "<npcname> finishes digging." ) );
1712  here.destroy( pos, true );
1713  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1714  item &it = *act->targets.front();
1715  you->consume_charges( it, it.ammo_required() );
1716  } else {
1717  debugmsg( "pickaxe activity targets empty" );
1718  }
1719  if( resume_for_multi_activities( *you ) ) {
1720  for( item &elem : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1721  elem.set_var( "activity_var", you->name );
1722  }
1723  }
1724 }

1726 void activity_handlers::pulp_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1727 {
1728  map &here = get_map();
1729  const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act->placement );
1730 
1731  const item_location weapon = you->get_wielded_item();
1732  int weap_cut = 0;
1733  int weap_stab = 0;
1734  int weap_bash = 0;
1735  int mess_radius = 1;
1736 
1737  if( weapon ) {
1738  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage types
1739  weap_cut = weapon->damage_melee( damage_cut );
1740  weap_stab = weapon->damage_melee( damage_stab );
1741  weap_bash = weapon->damage_melee( damage_bash );
1742  if( weapon->has_flag( flag_MESSY ) ) {
1743  mess_radius = 2;
1744  }
1745  }
1746 
1747  // Stabbing weapons are a lot less effective at pulping
1748  const int cut_power = std::max( weap_cut, weap_stab / 2 );
1749 
1750  ///\EFFECT_STR increases pulping power, with diminishing returns
1751  float pulp_power = std::sqrt( ( you->get_arm_str() + weap_bash ) * ( cut_power + 1.0f ) );
1752  float pulp_effort = you->str_cur + weap_bash;
1753 
1754  // Multiplier to get the chance right + some bonus for survival skill
1755  pulp_power *= 40 + you->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 5;
1756 
1757  int moves = 0;
1758  // use this to collect how many corpse are pulped
1759  int &num_corpses = act->index;
1760  map_stack corpse_pile = here.i_at( pos );
1761  for( item &corpse : corpse_pile ) {
1762  const mtype *corpse_mtype = corpse.get_mtype();
1763  const bool acid_immune = you->is_immune_damage( damage_acid ) ||
1764  you->is_immune_field( fd_acid );
1765  if( !corpse.is_corpse() || !corpse.can_revive() ||
1766  ( ( std::find( act->str_values.begin(), act->str_values.end(), "auto_pulp_no_acid" ) !=
1767  act->str_values.end() && corpse_mtype->bloodType().obj().has_acid ) && !acid_immune ) ) {
1768  // Don't smash non-rezing corpses //don't smash acid zombies when auto pulping unprotected
1769  continue;
1770  }
1771 
1772  while( corpse.damage() < corpse.max_damage() ) {
1773  // Increase damage as we keep smashing ensuring we eventually smash the target.
1774  if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
1775  corpse.inc_damage();
1776  if( corpse.damage() == corpse.max_damage() ) {
1777  num_corpses++;
1778  }
1779  }
1780 
1781  if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
1782  // Splatter some blood around
1783  // Splatter a bit more randomly, so that it looks cooler
1784  const int radius = mess_radius + x_in_y( pulp_power, 500 ) + x_in_y( pulp_power, 1000 );
1785  const tripoint dest( pos + point( rng( -radius, radius ), rng( -radius, radius ) ) );
1786  const field_type_id type_blood = ( mess_radius > 1 && x_in_y( pulp_power, 10000 ) ) ?
1787  corpse.get_mtype()->gibType() :
1788  corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType();
1789  here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, pos, dest );
1790  }
1791 
1792  // mixture of isaac clarke stomps and swinging your weapon
1793  you->burn_energy_all( -pulp_effort );
1794  you->recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
1795 
1796  if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1797  // Smashing may not be butchery, but it involves some zombie anatomy
1798  you->practice( skill_survival, 2, 2 );
1799  }
1800 
1801  float stamina_ratio = static_cast<float>( you->get_stamina() ) / you->get_stamina_max();
1802  moves += 100 / std::max( 0.25f,
1803  stamina_ratio ) * you->exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( act->exertion_level() );
1804  if( stamina_ratio < 0.33 || you->is_npc() ) {
1805  you->set_moves( std::min( 0, you->get_moves() - moves ) );
1806  return;
1807  }
1808  if( moves >= you->get_moves() ) {
1809  // Enough for this turn;
1810  you->mod_moves( -moves );
1811  return;
1812  }
1813  }
1814  corpse.set_flag( flag_PULPED );
1815  }
1816  // If we reach this, all corpses have been pulped, finish the activity
1817  act->moves_left = 0;
1818  if( num_corpses == 0 ) {
1819  you->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The corpse moved before you could finish smashing it!" ) );
1820  return;
1821  }
1822  // TODO: Factor in how long it took to do the smashing.
1823  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( n_gettext( "The corpse is thoroughly pulped.",
1824  "The corpses are thoroughly pulped.", num_corpses ),
1825  n_gettext( "<npcname> finished pulping the corpse.",
1826  "<npcname> finished pulping the corpses.", num_corpses ) );
1827 }
1828

1833  guy->revert_after_activity();
1834  guy->pulp_location.reset();
1835  } else {
1836  act->set_to_null();
1837  }

1840 void activity_handlers::start_fire_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )

1843

1846  if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
1847  debugmsg( "Lost tool used for starting fire" );
1848  act->set_to_null();

1850  }

1854  ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
1855  if( actor == nullptr ) {
1856  debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
1857  act->set_to_null();
1858  return;
1859  }

1861  it.activation_consume( 1, you->pos(), you );
1862 
1863  you->practice( skill_survival, act->index, 5 );

1869 void activity_handlers::start_fire_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1870 {
1871  map &here = get_map();
1872  // TODO: fix point types
1873  tripoint where = here.getlocal( act->placement );
1874  if( !here.is_flammable( where ) ) {
1875  try_fuel_fire( *act, *you, true );
1876  if( !here.is_flammable( where ) ) {
1877  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's nothing to light there." ) );
1878  you->cancel_activity();
1879  return;
1880  }
1881  }
1882 
1883  // Sometimes when an item is dropped it causes the whole item* to get set to null.
1884  // This null pointer gets cast to a reference at some point, causing UB and
1885  // segfaults. It looks like something is supposed to catch this, maybe
1886  // get_safe_reference in item.cpp, but it's not working so we check for a
1887  // null pointer here.
1888  //
1889  if( act->targets.front().get_item() == nullptr ) {
1890  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have lost the item you were using to start the fire." ) );
1891  you->cancel_activity();
1892  return;
1893  }
1894 
1895  item &firestarter = *act->targets.front();
1896  if( firestarter.has_flag( flag_REQUIRES_TINDER ) ) {
1897  if( !here.tinder_at( where ) ) {
1898  inventory_filter_preset preset( []( const item_location & loc ) {
1899  return loc->has_flag( flag_TINDER );
1900  } );
1901  inventory_pick_selector inv_s( *you, preset );
1902  inv_s.add_nearby_items( PICKUP_RANGE );
1903  inv_s.add_character_items( *you );
1904 
1905  inv_s.set_title( _( "Select tinder to use for lighting a fire" ) );
1906 
1907  item_location tinder;
1908  if( inv_s.empty() || !( tinder = inv_s.execute() ) ) {
1909  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This item requires tinder to light." ) );
1910  you->cancel_activity();
1911  return;
1912  }
1913 
1914  item copy = *tinder;
1915  bool count_by_charges = tinder->count_by_charges();
1916  if( count_by_charges ) {
1917  tinder->charges--;
1918  copy.charges = 1;
1919  }
1920  here.add_item_or_charges( where, copy );
1921  if( !count_by_charges || tinder->charges <= 0 ) {
1922  tinder.remove_item();
1923  }
1924  }
1925  }
1926 
1927  const use_function *usef = firestarter.type->get_use( "firestarter" );
1928  if( usef == nullptr || usef->get_actor_ptr() == nullptr ) {
1929  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have lost the item you were using to start the fire." ) );
1930  you->cancel_activity();
1931  return;
1932  }
1933 
1934  you->mod_moves( -you->get_moves() );
1935  const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
1936  const float light = actor->light_mod( you->pos() );
1937  act->moves_left -= light * 100;
1938  if( light < 0.1 ) {
1939  add_msg( m_bad, _( "There is not enough sunlight to start a fire now. You stop trying." ) );
1940  you->cancel_activity();
1941  }
1942 }

1944 static bool magic_train( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1945 {
1946  if( !you ) {
1947  return false;
1948  }
1949  const spell_id &sp_id = spell_id( act->name );
1950  if( sp_id.is_valid() ) {
1951  const bool knows = you->magic->knows_spell( sp_id );
1952  if( knows ) {
1953  spell &studying = you->magic->get_spell( sp_id );
1954  const int expert_multiplier = act->values.empty() ? 0 : act->values[0];
1955  const int xp = roll_remainder( studying.exp_modifier( *you ) * expert_multiplier );
1956  studying.gain_exp( *you, xp );
1957  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "You learn a little about the spell: %s" ),
1958  _( "<npcname> learns a little about the spell: %s" ), sp_id->name );
1959  } else {
1960  you->magic->learn_spell( act->name, *you );
1961  // you can decline to learn this spell , as it may lock you out of other magic.
1962  if( you->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
1963  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "You learn %s." ),
1964  _( "<npcname> learns %s." ), sp_id->name.translated() );
1965  } else {
1966  act->set_to_null();
1967  }
1968  }
1969  return true;
1970  }
1971  return false;
1972 }

1974 void activity_handlers::teach_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
1975 {
1976  const skill_id sk( act->name );

1978  const matype_id ma( act->name );
1979  const spell_id sp( act->name );

1981  std::string subject;

1984  } else if( pr.is_valid() ) {
1985  subject = pr->name();

1988  } else if( sp.is_valid() ) {
1989  subject = sp->name.translated();
1990  } else {
1991  debugmsg( "teach_finish without a valid skill or style or spell name" );
1992  }
1993 
1994  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
1995  add_msg( m_good, _( "You finish teaching %s." ), subject );

1997  add_msg( m_good, _( "%s finishes teaching %s." ), you->name, subject );

2003 void activity_handlers::train_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2004 {
2005  const std::vector<npc *> teachlist = g->get_npcs_if( [act]( const npc & n ) {
2006  return n.getID().get_value() == act->index;
2007  } );
2008  Character *teacher = &get_player_character();
2009  if( !teachlist.empty() ) {
2010  teacher = teachlist.front();
2011  }
2012  if( teacher->activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN_TEACHER ) {
2013  bool all_students_done = true;
2014  g->get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & n ) {
2015  for( int st_id : teacher->activity.values ) {
2016  if( n.getID().get_value() == st_id && n.activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN ) {
2017  all_students_done = false;
2018  break;
2019  }
2020  }
2021  return false;
2022  } );
2023  if( all_students_done ) {
2024  teacher->cancel_activity();
2025  }
2026  }
2027 
2028  const skill_id sk( act->name );
2029  if( sk.is_valid() ) {
2030  const Skill &skill = sk.obj();
2031  std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2032  int old_skill_level = you->get_knowledge_level( sk );
2033  you->practice( sk, 100, old_skill_level + 2 );
2034  int new_skill_level = you->get_knowledge_level( sk );
2035  if( old_skill_level != new_skill_level ) {
2036  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
2037  add_msg( m_good, _( "You finish training %s to level %d." ),
2038  skill_name, new_skill_level );
2039  }
2040  get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>( you->getID(), sk, new_skill_level );
2041  } else if( you->is_avatar() ) {
2042  add_msg( m_good, _( "You get some training in %s." ), skill_name );
2043  }
2044  act->set_to_null();
2045  return;
2046  }
2047 
2048  const proficiency_id &proficiency = proficiency_id( act->name );
2049  if( proficiency.is_valid() ) {
2050  you->practice_proficiency( proficiency, 15_minutes );
2051  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
2052  add_msg( m_good, _( "You get some training in %s." ), proficiency->name() );
2053  }
2054  act->set_to_null();
2055  return;
2056  }
2057 
2058  const matype_id &ma_id = matype_id( act->name );
2059  if( ma_id.is_valid() ) {
2060  const martialart &mastyle = ma_id.obj();
2061  // Trained martial arts,
2062  get_event_bus().send<event_type::learns_martial_art>( you->getID(), ma_id );
2063  you->martial_arts_data->learn_style( mastyle.id, you->is_avatar() );
2064  } else if( !magic_train( act, you ) ) {
2065  debugmsg( "train_finish without a valid skill or style or spell name" );
2066  }
2067 
2068  act->set_to_null();
2069 }
2070 
2071 void activity_handlers::vehicle_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2072 {
2073  map &here = get_map();
2074  //Grab this now, in case the vehicle gets shifted
2075  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( tripoint( act->values[0],
2076  act->values[1],
2077  you->posz() ) ) );
2078  veh_interact::complete_vehicle( *you );
2079  // complete_vehicle set activity type to NULL if the vehicle
2080  // was completely dismantled, otherwise the vehicle still exist and
2081  // is to be examined again.
2082  if( act->is_null() ) {
2083  if( npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( you ) ) {
2084  guy->revert_after_activity();
2085  guy->set_moves( 0 );
2086  }
2087  return;
2088  }
2089  act->set_to_null();
2090  if( !you->is_npc() ) {
2091  if( act->values.size() < 7 ) {
2092  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "game:process_activity: invalid ACT_VEHICLE values: "
2093  << act->values.size();
2094  debugmsg( "process_activity invalid ACT_VEHICLE values:%d",
2095  act->values.size() );
2096  } else {
2097  if( vp ) {
2098  here.invalidate_map_cache( here.get_abs_sub().z() );
2099  // TODO: Z (and also where the activity is queued)
2100  // Or not, because the vehicle coordinates are dropped anyway
2101  if( !resume_for_multi_activities( *you ) ) {
2102  point int_p( act->values[ 2 ], act->values[ 3 ] );
2103  if( vp->vehicle().is_appliance() ) {
2104  g->exam_appliance( vp->vehicle(), int_p );
2105  } else {
2106  g->exam_vehicle( vp->vehicle(), int_p );
2107  }
2108  }
2109  return;
2110  } else {
2111  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "game:process_activity: ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found";
2112  debugmsg( "process_activity ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found" );
2113  }
2114  }
2115  }
2116 }

2118 void activity_handlers::hand_crank_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2119 {
2120  // Hand-crank chargers seem to range from 2 watt (very common easily verified)
2121  // to 10 watt (suspicious claims from some manufacturers) sustained output.
2122  // It takes 2.4 minutes to produce 1kj at just slightly under 7 watts (25 kj per hour)
2123  // time-based instead of speed based because it's a sustained activity
2124  item &hand_crank_item = *act->targets.front();
2125 
2126  int time_to_crank = to_seconds<int>( 144_seconds );
2127  // Modify for weariness
2128  time_to_crank /= you->exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( act->exertion_level() );
2129  if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_seconds( time_to_crank ) ) ) {
2130  if( hand_crank_item.ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ) > hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() ) {
2131  hand_crank_item.ammo_set( itype_battery, hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() + 1 );
2132  } else {
2133  act->moves_left = 0;
2134  add_msg( m_info, _( "You've charged the battery completely." ) );
2135  }
2136  }
2137  if( you->get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
2138  act->moves_left = 0;
2139  add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too exhausted to keep cranking." ) );
2140  }
2141 
2142 }

2144 void activity_handlers::vibe_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2145 {
2146  //Using a vibrator takes time (10 minutes), not speed
2147  //Linear increase in morale during action with a small boost at end
2148  //Deduct 1 battery charge for every minute in use, or vibrator is much less effective
2149  item &vibrator_item = *act->targets.front();
2150 
2151  if( you->encumb( bodypart_id( "mouth" ) ) >= 30 ) {
2152  act->moves_left = 0;
2153  add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have trouble breathing, and stop." ) );
2154  }
2155 
2156  if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2157  if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining( you ) > 0 ) {
2158  vibrator_item.ammo_consume( 1, you->pos(), you );
2159  you->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 3, 40 );
2160  if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining( you ) == 0 ) {
2161  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), vibrator_item.tname() );
2162  }
2163  } else {
2164  //twenty minutes to fill
2165  you->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 1, 40 );
2166  }
2167  }
2168  // Dead Tired: different kind of relaxation needed
2169  if( you->get_sleepiness() >= sleepiness_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
2170  act->moves_left = 0;
2171  add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too tired to continue." ) );
2172  }
2173 
2174  // Vibrator requires that you be able to move around, stretch, etc, so doesn't play
2175  // well with roots. Sorry. :-(
2176 }

2178 void activity_handlers::start_engines_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2179 {
2180  act->set_to_null();
2181  // Find the vehicle by looking for a remote vehicle first, then at
2182  // act->relative_placement away from avatar
2183  vehicle *veh = g->remoteveh();
2184  map &here = get_map();
2185  if( !veh ) {
2186  const tripoint_bub_ms pos = get_player_character().pos_bub() + act->relative_placement;
2187  veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( pos ) );
2188  if( !veh ) {
2189  return;
2190  }
2191  }
2192 
2193  int attempted = 0;
2194  int non_muscle_attempted = 0;
2195  int started = 0;
2196  int non_muscle_started = 0;
2197  int non_combustion_started = 0;
2198  const bool take_control = act->values[0];
2199 
2200  for( const int p : veh->engines ) {
2201  vehicle_part &vp = veh->part( p );
2202  if( veh->is_engine_on( vp ) ) {
2203  attempted++;
2204  if( !veh->is_engine_type( vp, itype_muscle ) &&
2205  !veh->is_engine_type( vp, itype_animal ) ) {
2206  non_muscle_attempted++;
2207  }
2208  if( veh->start_engine( vp ) ) {
2209  started++;
2210  if( !veh->is_engine_type( vp, itype_muscle ) &&
2211  !veh->is_engine_type( vp, itype_animal ) ) {
2212  non_muscle_started++;
2213  } else {
2214  non_combustion_started++;
2215  }
2216  }
2217  }
2218  }
2219 
2220  //Did any engines start?
2221  veh->engine_on = started;
2222  //init working engine noise
2223  sfx::do_vehicle_engine_sfx();
2224 
2225  if( attempted == 0 ) {
2226  add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have an engine!" ), veh->name );
2227  } else if( non_muscle_attempted > 0 ) {
2228  //Some non-muscle engines tried to start
2229  if( non_muscle_attempted == non_muscle_started ) {
2230  //All of the non-muscle engines started
2231  add_msg( n_gettext( "The %s's engine starts up.",
2232  "The %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2233  } else if( non_muscle_started > 0 ) {
2234  //Only some of the non-muscle engines started
2235  add_msg( n_gettext( "One of the %s's engines start up.",
2236  "Some of the %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2237  } else if( non_combustion_started > 0 ) {
2238  //Non-combustions "engines" started
2239  add_msg( _( "The %s is ready for movement." ), veh->name );
2240  } else {
2241  //All of the non-muscle engines failed
2242  add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "The %s's engine fails to start.",
2243  "The %s's engines fail to start.", non_muscle_attempted ), veh->name );
2244  }
2245  }
2246 
2247  if( take_control && !veh->engine_on && !veh->velocity ) {
2248  you->controlling_vehicle = false;
2249  add_msg( _( "You let go of the controls." ) );
2250  }
2251 }
2252 
2253 enum class repeat_type : int {
2254  // INIT should be zero. In some scenarios (vehicle welder), activity value default to zero.
2255  INIT = 0, // Haven't found repeat value yet.
2256  ONCE = 1, // Attempt repair (and refit if possible) just once
2257  // value 2 obsolete - previously used for reinforcement
2258  FULL = 3, // Continue repairing until damage==0 (and until refitted if possible)
2259  EVENT = 4, // Continue repairing (and refit if possible) until something interesting happens
2260  REFIT_ONCE = 5, // Try refitting once, but don't repair
2261  REFIT_FULL = 6, // Continue refitting until item fits, but don't repair
2262  CANCEL = 7, // Stop repeating
2263 };
2264 
2265 using I = std::underlying_type_t<repeat_type>;
2266 static constexpr bool operator>=( const I &lhs, const repeat_type &rhs )
2267 {
2268  return lhs >= static_cast<I>( rhs );
2269 }
2270 
2271 static constexpr bool operator<=( const I &lhs, const repeat_type &rhs )
2272 {
2273  return lhs <= static_cast<I>( rhs );
2274 }
2275 
2276 static constexpr I operator-( const repeat_type &lhs, const repeat_type &rhs )
2277 {
2278  return static_cast<I>( lhs ) - static_cast<I>( rhs );
2279 }
2280 
2281 static repeat_type repeat_menu( const std::string &title, repeat_type last_selection,
2282  const bool can_refit )
2283 {
2284  uilist rmenu;
2285  rmenu.text = title;
2286 
2287  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::ONCE ), true, '1',
2288  can_refit ? _( "Attempt to refit or repair once" ) : _( "Attempt to repair once" ) );
2289  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::FULL ), true, '2',
2290  can_refit ? _( "Repeat until refitted and fully repaired" ) : _( "Repeat until fully repaired" ) );
2291  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::EVENT ), true, '3',
2292  can_refit ? _( "Refit or repair until success/failure/level up" ) :
2293  _( "Repair until success/failure/level up" ) );
2294  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REFIT_ONCE ), can_refit, '4',
2295  _( "Attempt to refit once" ) );
2296  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REFIT_FULL ), can_refit, '5',
2297  _( "Repeat until refitted" ) );
2298  rmenu.addentry( static_cast<int>( repeat_type::INIT ), true, '6', _( "Back to item selection" ) );
2299 
2300  rmenu.selected = last_selection - repeat_type::ONCE;
2301  rmenu.query();
2302 
2303  if( rmenu.ret >= repeat_type::INIT && rmenu.ret <= repeat_type::REFIT_FULL ) {
2304  return static_cast<repeat_type>( rmenu.ret );
2305  }
2306 
2307  return repeat_type::CANCEL;
2308 }

2310 // HACK: This is a part of a hack to provide pseudo items for long repair activity
2311 // Note: similar hack could be used to implement all sorts of vehicle pseudo-items
2312 // and possibly CBM pseudo-items too.
2313 struct weldrig_hack {
2314  std::optional<vpart_reference> part;
2315  item pseudo;
2316 
2317  weldrig_hack() : part( std::nullopt ) { }
2318 
2319  bool init( const player_activity &act ) {
2320  if( act.coords.empty() || act.str_values.size() < 2 ) {
2321  return false;
2322  }
2323 
2324  const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( act.coords[0] );
2325  if( !vp ) {
2326  return false;
2327  }
2328 
2329  itype_id tool_id( act.get_str_value( 1, "" ) );
2330  pseudo = item( tool_id, calendar::turn );
2331  part = vp->part_with_tool( tool_id );
2332  return part.has_value();
2333  }
2334 
2335  item &get_item() {
2336  if( !part ) {
2337  // null item should be handled just fine
2338  return null_item_reference();
2339  }
2340  pseudo.set_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "PSEUDO" ) ) );
2341  item mag_mod( "pseudo_magazine_mod" );
2342  mag_mod.set_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "IRREMOVABLE" ) ) );
2343  if( !pseudo.put_in( mag_mod, pocket_type::MOD ).success() ) {
2344  debugmsg( "tool %s has no space for a %s, this is likely a bug",
2345  pseudo.typeId().str(), mag_mod.type->nname( 1 ) );
2346  }
2347  itype_id mag_type;
2348  if( pseudo.can_link_up() ) {
2349  mag_type = itype_pseudo_magazine;
2350  } else {
2351  mag_type = pseudo.magazine_default();
2352  }
2353  item mag( mag_type );
2354  mag.clear_items(); // no initial ammo
2355  if( !pseudo.put_in( mag, pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL ).success() ) {
2356  debugmsg( "inserting %s into %s's MAGAZINE_WELL pocket failed",
2357  mag.typeId().str(), pseudo.typeId().str() );
2358  return null_item_reference();
2359  }
2360  pseudo.ammo_set( itype_battery, part->vehicle().drain( itype_battery,
2361  pseudo.ammo_capacity( ammo_battery ),
2362  return_true< vehicle_part &>, false ) ); // no cable loss since all of this is virtual
2363  return pseudo;
2364  }
2365 
2366  void clean_up() {
2367  if( !part ) {
2368  return;
2369  }
2370 
2371  part->vehicle().charge_battery( pseudo.ammo_remaining(),
2372  false ); // return unused charges without cable loss
2373  }
2374 
2375  ~weldrig_hack() {
2376  clean_up();
2377  }
2378 };

2380 void activity_handlers::repair_item_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
