2385 void repair_item_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you, bool no_menu )
2386 {
2387  const std::string iuse_name_string = act->get_str_value( 0, "repair_item" );
2388  repeat_type repeat = static_cast<repeat_type>( act->get_value( 0,
2389  static_cast<int>( repeat_type::INIT ) ) );
2390  weldrig_hack w_hack;
2391  item_location *ploc = nullptr;
2392 
2393  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
2394  ploc = act->targets.data();
2395  }
2396  item *main_tool = &( !w_hack.init( *act ) ?
2397  ploc ?
2398  **ploc : you->i_at( act->index ) : w_hack.get_item() );
2399  if( main_tool == nullptr ) {
2400  debugmsg( "Empty main tool for repair" );
2401  act->set_to_null();
2402  return;
2403  }
2404  item *used_tool = main_tool->get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
2405  if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
2406  debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long repair" );
2407  act->set_to_null();
2408  return;
2409  }
2410 
2411  const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
2412  // TODO: De-uglify this block. Something like get_use<iuse_actor_type>() maybe?
2413  const repair_item_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const repair_item_actor *>
2414  ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
2415  if( actor == nullptr ) {
2416  debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
2417  act->set_to_null();
2418  return;
2419  }
2420 
2421  // Valid Repeat choice and target, attempt repair.
2422  if( repeat != repeat_type::INIT && act->targets.size() >= 2 ) {
2423  item_location &fix_location = act->targets[1];
2424 
2425  // Remember our level: we want to stop retrying on level up
2426  const int old_level = you->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2427  const repair_item_actor::attempt_hint attempt = actor->repair( *you, *used_tool,
2428  fix_location, repeat == repeat_type::REFIT_ONCE || repeat == repeat_type::REFIT_FULL );
2429 
2430  // If the item being repaired has been destroyed stop further
2431  // processing in case the items being used for the repair was
2432  // contained by the item being repaired, which will result
2433  // in the tool being invalid
2434  if( attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_DESTROYED ) {
2435  act->set_to_null();
2436  return;
2437  }
2438 
2439  if( attempt != repair_item_actor::AS_CANT ) {
2440  if( ploc && ploc->where() == item_location::type::map ) {
2441  used_tool->ammo_consume( used_tool->ammo_required(), ploc->position(), you );
2442  } else {
2443  you->consume_charges( *used_tool, used_tool->ammo_required() );
2444  }
2445  }
2446 
2447  // TODO: Allow setting this in the actor
2448  // TODO: Don't use charges_to_use: welder has 50 charges per use, soldering iron has 1
2449  if( !used_tool->ammo_sufficient( you ) ) {
2450  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s ran out of charges." ), used_tool->tname() );
2451  act->set_to_null();
2452  return;
2453  }
2454 
2455  // Print message explaining why we stopped
2456  // But only if we didn't destroy the item (because then it's obvious)
2457  const bool destroyed = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_DESTROYED;
2458  const bool cannot_continue_repair = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_CANT || destroyed ||
2459  !actor->can_repair_target( *you, *fix_location, !destroyed, true );
2460  if( cannot_continue_repair ) {
2461  // Cannot continue to repair target, select another target.
2462  // **Warning**: as soon as the item is popped back, it is destroyed and can't be used anymore!
2463  act->targets.pop_back();
2464  }
2465 
2466  const bool event_happened = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_FAILURE ||
2467  attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_SUCCESS ||
2468  old_level != static_cast<int>( you->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill ) );
2469  const bool can_refit = !destroyed && !cannot_continue_repair &&
2470  fix_location->has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) &&
2471  !fix_location->has_flag( flag_FIT );
2472 
2473  const bool need_input =
2474  ( repeat == repeat_type::ONCE ) ||
2475  ( repeat == repeat_type::EVENT && event_happened ) ||
2476  ( repeat == repeat_type::FULL && cannot_continue_repair ) ||
2477  ( repeat == repeat_type::REFIT_ONCE ) ||
2478  ( repeat == repeat_type::REFIT_FULL && !can_refit );
2479  if( need_input ) {
2480  repeat = repeat_type::INIT;
2481  if( no_menu ) {
2482  act->set_to_null();
2483  return;
2484  }
2485  }
2486  }
2487  // Check tool is valid before we query target and Repeat choice.
2488  if( !actor->can_use_tool( *you, *used_tool, true ) ) {
2489  act->set_to_null();
2490  return;
2491  }
2492 
2493  // target selection and validation.
2494  while( act->targets.size() < 2 ) {
2495  item_location item_loc = game_menus::inv::repair( *you, actor, main_tool );
2496 
2497  if( item_loc == item_location::nowhere ) {
2498  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2499  act->set_to_null();
2500  return;
2501  }
2502  if( actor->can_repair_target( *you, *item_loc, true, true ) ) {
2503  act->targets.emplace_back( item_loc );
2504  repeat = repeat_type::INIT;
2505  }
2506  }
2507 
2508  const item &fix = *act->targets[1];
2509  const bool can_refit = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) && !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT );
2510  if( repeat == repeat_type::INIT ) {
2511  const int level = you->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2512  repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type = actor->default_action( fix, level );
2513  if( action_type == repair_item_actor::RT_NOTHING ) {
2514  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
2515  }
2516 
2517  const std::pair<float, float> chance = actor->repair_chance( *you, fix, action_type );
2518  if( chance.first <= 0.0f ) {
2519  action_type = repair_item_actor::RT_PRACTICE;
2520  }
2521 
2522  std::string title = string_format( _( "%s %s\n" ),
2523  repair_item_actor::action_description( action_type ),
2524  fix.tname() );
2525  ammotype current_ammo;
2526  std::string ammo_name;
2527  if( used_tool->has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) || used_tool->has_link_data() ) {
2528  ammo_name = _( "battery" );
2529  current_ammo = ammo_battery;
2530  } else if( used_tool->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
2531  ammo_name = _( "bionic power" );
2532 
2533  } else {
2534  if( used_tool->ammo_current().is_null() ) {
2535  current_ammo = item_controller->find_template( used_tool->ammo_default() )->ammo->type;
2536  } else {
2537  current_ammo = item_controller->find_template( used_tool->ammo_current() )->ammo->type;
2538  }
2539  ammo_name = item::nname( used_tool->ammo_current() );
2540  }
2541 
2542  int ammo_remaining = used_tool->ammo_remaining( you, true );
2543 
2544  std::set<itype_id> valid_entries = actor->get_valid_repair_materials( fix );
2545  const inventory &crafting_inv = you->crafting_inventory();
2546  std::function<bool( const item & )> filter;
2547  if( fix.is_filthy() ) {
2548  filter = []( const item & component ) {
2549  return component.allow_crafting_component();
2550  };
2551  } else {
2552  filter = is_crafting_component;
2553  }
2554  std::vector<std::string> material_list;
2555  for( const auto &component_id : valid_entries ) {
2556  if( item::count_by_charges( component_id ) ) {
2557  if( crafting_inv.has_charges( component_id, 1 ) ) {
2558  material_list.push_back( string_format( _( "%s (%d)" ), item::nname( component_id ),
2559  crafting_inv.charges_of( component_id ) ) );
2560  }
2561  } else if( crafting_inv.has_amount( component_id, 1, false, filter ) ) {
2562  material_list.push_back( string_format( _( "%s (%d)" ), item::nname( component_id ),
2563  crafting_inv.amount_of( component_id, false ) ) );
2564  }
2565  }
2566 
2567  title += string_format( _( "Charges: <color_light_blue>%s/%s</color> %s (%s per use)\n" ),
2568  ammo_remaining, used_tool->ammo_capacity( current_ammo, true ),
2569  ammo_name,
2570  used_tool->ammo_required() );
2571  title += string_format( _( "Materials available: %s\n" ), string_join( material_list, ", " ) );
2572  title += string_format( _( "Skill used: <color_light_blue>%s (%s)</color>\n" ),
2573  actor->used_skill.obj().name(), level );
2574  title += string_format( _( "Success chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%\n" ),
2575  100.0f * chance.first );
2576  title += string_format( _( "Damage chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%" ),
2577  100.0f * chance.second );
2578 
2579  if( act->values.empty() ) {
2580  act->values.resize( 1 );
2581  }
2582  do {
2583  repeat = repeat_menu( title, repeat, can_refit );
2584 
2585  if( repeat == repeat_type::CANCEL ) {
2586  act->set_to_null();
2587  return;
2588  }
2589  act->values[0] = static_cast<int>( repeat );
2590  // BACK selected, redo target selection next.
2591  if( repeat == repeat_type::INIT ) {
2592  you->activity.targets.pop_back();
2593  return;
2594  }
2595  if( repeat == repeat_type::FULL && fix.damage() <= fix.degradation() && !can_refit ) {
2596  const char *msg = fix.damage_level() > 0 ?
2597  _( "Your %s is repaired as much as possible, considering the degradation." ) :
2598  _( "Your %s is already fully repaired." );
2599  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, msg, fix.tname() );
2600  repeat = repeat_type::INIT;
2601  }
2602  } while( repeat == repeat_type::INIT );
2603  }
2604  // Otherwise keep retrying
2605  act->moves_left = actor->move_cost;
2606 }

2608 void activity_handlers::heat_item_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2609 {
2610  act->set_to_null();
2611  if( act->targets.size() != 1 ) {
2612  debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_HEATING" );
2613  return;
2614  }
2615  item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
2616  item *const heat = loc.get_item();
2617  if( heat == nullptr ) {
2618  return;
2619  }
2620  if( !heat->has_temperature() ) {
2621  debugmsg( "item %s is not heatable", heat->typeId().str() );
2622  return;
2623  }
2624  item &target = *heat;
2625  if( target.has_own_flag( flag_FROZEN ) ) {
2626  target.apply_freezerburn();
2627  if( target.has_flag( flag_EATEN_COLD ) ) {
2628  target.cold_up();
2629  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2630  _( "You defrost the food, but don't heat it up, since you enjoy it cold." ) );
2631  } else {
2632  target.heat_up();
2633  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You defrost and heat up the food." ) );
2634  }
2635  } else {
2636  target.heat_up();
2637  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You heat up the food." ) );
2638  }
2639 }

2641 void activity_handlers::mend_item_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2642 {
2643  act->set_to_null();
2644  if( act->targets.size() != 1 ) {
2645  debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_MEND_ITEM" );
2646  return;
2647  }
2648  if( !act->targets[0] ) {
2649  debugmsg( "lost targets[0] item location for ACT_MEND_ITEM" );
2650  return;
2651  }
2652  item &target = *act->targets[0];
2653  const fault_id fault_id( act->name );
2654  if( target.faults.count( fault_id ) == 0 ) {
2655  debugmsg( "item %s does not have fault %s", target.tname(), fault_id.str() );
2656  return;
2657  }
2658  if( act->str_values.empty() ) {
2659  debugmsg( "missing fault_fix_id for ACT_MEND_ITEM." );
2660  return;
2661  }
2662  const fault_fix_id fix_id( act->str_values[0] );
2663  if( !fix_id.is_valid() ) {
2664  debugmsg( "invalid fault_fix_id '%s' for ACT_MEND_ITEM.", fix_id.str() );
2665  return;
2666  }
2667  const fault_fix &fix = *fix_id;
2668  const requirement_data &reqs = fix.get_requirements();
2669  const inventory &inv = you->crafting_inventory();
2670  if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
2671  add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s." ), target.tname() );
2672  return;
2673  }
2674  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
2675  you->consume_items( e );
2676  }
2677  for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
2678  you->consume_tools( e );
2679  }
2680  you->invalidate_crafting_inventory();
2681 
2682  for( const ::fault_id &id : fix.faults_removed ) {
2683  target.faults.erase( id );
2684  }
2685  for( const ::fault_id &id : fix.faults_added ) {
2686  target.faults.insert( id );
2687  }
2688  for( const auto &[var_name, var_value] : fix.set_variables ) {
2689  target.set_var( var_name, var_value );
2690  }
2691 
2692  const std::string start_durability = target.durability_indicator( true );
2693 
2694  if( fix.mod_damage ) {
2695  target.mod_damage( fix.mod_damage );
2696  }
2697  if( fix.mod_degradation ) {
2698  target.set_degradation( target.degradation() + fix.mod_degradation );
2699  }
2700 
2701  for( const auto &[skill_id, level] : fix.skills ) {
2702  you->practice( skill_id, 10, static_cast<int>( level * 1.25 ) );
2703  }
2704 
2705  for( const auto &[proficiency_id, mult] : fix.time_save_profs ) {
2706  you->practice_proficiency( proficiency_id, fix.time );
2707  }
2708 
2709  add_msg( m_good, fix.success_msg.translated(), target.tname( 1, false ),
2710  start_durability, target.durability_indicator( true ) );
2711 }

2764 void activity_handlers::view_recipe_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2765 {
2766  if( !you->is_avatar() ) {
2767  return;
2768  }
2769 
2770  recipe_id id( act->name );
2771  std::string itname;
2772  if( act->index != 0 ) {
2773  // act->name is recipe_id
2774  itname = id->result_name();
2775  if( !you->get_group_available_recipes().contains( &id.obj() ) ) {
2776  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't know how to craft the %s!" ), itname );
2777  return;
2778  }
2779  you->craft( std::nullopt, id );
2780  return;
2781  }
2782  // act->name is itype_id
2783  itype_id item( act->name );
2784  itname = item->nname( 1U );
2785 
2786  bool is_byproduct = false; // product or byproduct
2787  bool can_craft = false;
2788  // Does a recipe for the item exist?
2789  for( const auto& [_, r] : recipe_dict ) {
2790  if( !r.obsolete && ( item == r.result() || r.in_byproducts( item ) ) ) {
2791  is_byproduct = true;
2792  // If a recipe exists, does my group know it?
2793  if( you->get_group_available_recipes().contains( &r ) ) {
2794  can_craft = true;
2795  break;
2796  }
2797  }
2798  }
2799  if( !is_byproduct ) {
2800  add_msg( m_info, _( "You wonder if it's even possible to craft the %s" ), itname );
2801  return;
2802  } else if( !can_craft ) {
2803  add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't know how to craft the %s!" ), itname );
2804  return;
2805  }
2806 
2807  std::string filterstring = string_format( "r:%s", itname );
2808  you->craft( std::nullopt, recipe_id(), filterstring );
2809 }

2822 void activity_handlers::travel_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2823 {
2824  if( !you->omt_path.empty() ) {
2825  you->omt_path.pop_back();
2826  if( you->omt_path.empty() ) {
2827  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
2828  act->set_to_null();
2829  return;
2830  }
2831  const tripoint_abs_omt next_omt = you->omt_path.back();
2832  tripoint_abs_ms waypoint;
2833  if( you->omt_path.size() == 1 ) {
2834  // if next omt is the final one, target its midpoint
2835  waypoint = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
2836  } else {
2837  // otherwise target the middle of the edge nearest to our current location
2838  const tripoint_abs_ms cur_omt_mid = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>
2839  ( you->global_omt_location() ) );
2840  waypoint = clamp( cur_omt_mid, project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
2841  }
2842  map &here = get_map();
2843  tripoint_bub_ms centre_sub = here.bub_from_abs( waypoint );
2844  if( !here.passable( centre_sub ) ) {
2845  tripoint_range<tripoint_bub_ms> candidates = here.points_in_radius( centre_sub, 2 );
2846  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : candidates ) {
2847  if( here.passable( elem ) ) {
2848  centre_sub = elem;
2849  break;
2850  }
2851  }
2852  }
2853  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route_to =
2854  here.route( you->pos_bub(), centre_sub, you->get_pathfinding_settings(),
2855  you->get_path_avoid() );
2856  if( !route_to.empty() ) {
2857  const activity_id act_travel = ACT_TRAVELLING;
2858  you->set_destination( route_to, player_activity( act_travel ) );
2859  } else {
2860  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot reach that destination" ) );
2861  }
2862  } else {
2863  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
2864  }
2865  act->set_to_null();
2866 }

2879 // fish-with-rod fish catching function.
2880 static void rod_fish( Character *you, const std::vector<monster *> &fishables )
2881 {
2882  map &here = get_map();
2883  //if the vector is empty (no fish around) the player is still given a small chance to get a (let us say it was hidden) fish
2884  if( fishables.empty() ) {
2885  const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
2886  GROUP_FISH, true );
2887  const mtype_id fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
2888  here.add_item_or_charges( you->pos(), item::make_corpse( fish_mon, calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
2889  3_hours ) ) );
2890  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), fish_mon.obj().nname() );
2891  } else {
2892  monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
2893  chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
2894  if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
2895  g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, you->pos(), you, 50_hours );
2896  } else {
2897  here.add_item_or_charges( you->pos(), item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
2898  calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
2899  3_hours ) ) );
2900  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), chosen_fish->type->nname() );
2901  }
2902  }
2903  for( item &elem : here.i_at( you->pos() ) ) {
2904  if( elem.is_corpse() && !elem.has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
2905  elem.set_var( "activity_var", you->name );
2906  }
2907  }
2908 }
2909 
2910 void activity_handlers::fish_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2911 {
2912  item &it = *act->targets.front();
2913  float fish_chance = 1.0f;
2914  float survival_skill = you->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2915  switch( it.get_quality( qual_FISHING_ROD ) ) {
2916  case 1:
2917  survival_skill += dice( 1, 6 );
2918  break;
2919  case 2:
2920  // Much better chances with a good fishing implement.
2921  survival_skill += dice( 4, 9 );
2922  survival_skill *= 2;
2923  break;
2924  default:
2925  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid FISHING_ROD tool quality on %s", item::nname( it.typeId() ) );
2926  break;
2927  }
2928  std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( act->coord_set );
2929  // Fish are always there, even if it doesn't seem like they are visible!
2930  if( fishables.empty() ) {
2931  fish_chance += survival_skill / 2;
2932  } else {
2933  // if they are visible however, it implies a larger population
2934  for( monster *elem : fishables ) {
2935  fish_chance += elem->fish_population;
2936  }
2937  fish_chance += survival_skill;
2938  }
2939  // no matter the population of fish, your skill and tool limits the ease of catching.
2940  fish_chance = std::min( survival_skill * 10, fish_chance );
2941  if( x_in_y( fish_chance, 600000 ) ) {
2942  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel a tug on your line!" ) );
2943  rod_fish( you, fishables );
2944  }
2945  if( calendar::once_every( 60_minutes ) ) {
2946  you->practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, 3 ) );
2947  }
2948 
2949 }

2956  you->backlog.clear();
2957  you->assign_activity( ACT_TIDY_UP );
2958  }

2961 void activity_handlers::repair_item_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2962 {
2963  // Moves are decremented based on a combination of speed and good vision (not in the dark, farsighted, etc)
2964  const float exertion_mult = you->exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( act->exertion_level() );
2965  const int effective_moves = you->get_moves() / ( you->fine_detail_vision_mod() * exertion_mult );
2966  if( effective_moves <= act->moves_left ) {
2967  act->moves_left -= effective_moves;
2968  you->set_moves( 0 );
2969  } else {
2970  you->mod_moves( -act->moves_left * you->fine_detail_vision_mod() );
2971  act->moves_left = 0;
2972  }
2973 }

2992 void activity_handlers::find_mount_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
2993 {
2994  //npc only activity
2995  if( you->is_avatar() ) {
2996  act->set_to_null();
2997  return;
2998  }
2999  npc &guy = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *you );
3000  auto strong_monster = guy.chosen_mount.lock();
3001  monster *mon = strong_monster.get();
3002  if( !mon ) {
3003  act->set_to_null();
3004  guy.revert_after_activity();
3005  return;
3006  }
3007  if( rl_dist( guy.pos(), mon->pos() ) <= 1 ) {
3008  if( mon->has_effect( effect_controlled ) ) {
3009  mon->remove_effect( effect_controlled );
3010  }
3011  if( you->can_mount( *mon ) ) {
3012  act->set_to_null();
3013  guy.revert_after_activity();
3014  guy.chosen_mount = weak_ptr_fast<monster>();
3015  you->mount_creature( *mon );
3016  } else {
3017  act->set_to_null();
3018  guy.revert_after_activity();
3019  return;
3020  }
3021  } else {
3022  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route =
3023  route_adjacent( *you, guy.chosen_mount.lock()->pos_bub() );
3024  if( route.empty() ) {
3025  act->set_to_null();
3026  guy.revert_after_activity();
3027  mon->remove_effect( effect_controlled );
3028  return;
3029  } else {
3030  you->activity = player_activity();
3031  mon->add_effect( effect_controlled, 40_turns );
3032  you->set_destination( route, player_activity( ACT_FIND_MOUNT ) );
3033  }
3034  }
3035 }

3081 void activity_handlers::operation_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3082 {
3083  /**
3084  - values[0]: Difficulty
3085  - values[1]: success
3086  - values[2]: bionic UID when uninstalling
3087  - values[3]: pl_skill
3088  - str_values[0]: install/uninstall
3089  - str_values[1]: bionic_id when installing
3090  - str_values[2]: installer_name
3091  - str_values[3]: bool autodoc
3092  */
3093  enum operation_values_ids {
3094  operation_type = 0,
3095  cbm_id = 1,
3096  installer_name = 2,
3097  is_autodoc = 3
3098  };
3099  const bionic_id bid( act->str_values[cbm_id] );
3100  const bool autodoc = act->str_values[is_autodoc] == "true";
3101  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3102  const bool u_see = player_character.sees( you->pos() ) &&
3103  ( !player_character.has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
3104  player_character.has_bionic( bio_painkiller ) ||
3105  player_character.has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) );
3106 
3107  const int difficulty = act->values.front();
3108 
3109  const std::vector<bodypart_id> bps = get_occupied_bodyparts( bid );
3110 
3111  const time_duration half_op_duration = difficulty * 10_minutes;
3112  const time_duration message_freq = difficulty * 2_minutes;
3113  time_duration time_left = time_duration::from_moves( act->moves_left );
3114 
3115  map &here = get_map();
3116  if( autodoc && here.inbounds( you->pos() ) ) {
3117  const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = here.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( you->pos(), 1,
3118  ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AUTODOC );
3119 
3120  if( !here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_AUTODOC_COUCH, you->pos() ) || autodocs.empty() ) {
3121  you->remove_effect( effect_under_operation );
3122  act->set_to_null();
3123 
3124  if( u_see ) {
3125  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The Autodoc suffers a catastrophic failure." ) );
3126 
3127  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3128  _( "The Autodoc's failure damages you greatly." ),
3129  _( "The Autodoc's failure damages <npcname> greatly." ) );
3130  }
3131  if( !bps.empty() ) {
3132  for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3133  you->add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_minutes * difficulty, bp, true, 1 );
3134  you->apply_damage( nullptr, bp, 20 * difficulty );
3135 
3136  if( u_see ) {
3137  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is ripped open." ),
3138  _( "<npcname>'s %s is ripped open." ), body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
3139  }
3140 
3141  if( bp == bodypart_id( "eyes" ) ) {

3313 void activity_handlers::build_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3314 {
3315  map &here = get_map();
3316  partial_con *pc = here.partial_con_at( here.bub_from_abs( act->placement ) );
3317  // Maybe the player and the NPC are working on the same construction at the same time
3318  if( !pc ) {
3319  if( you->is_npc() ) {
3320  // if player completes the work while NPC still in activity loop
3321  you->activity = player_activity();
3322  you->set_moves( 0 );
3323  } else {
3324  you->cancel_activity();
3325  }
3326  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s did not find an unfinished construction at the activity spot." ),
3327  you->disp_name() );
3328  return;
3329  }
3330  you->set_activity_level( pc->id->activity_level );
3331  // if you ( or NPC ) are finishing someone else's started construction...
3332  const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
3333  if( !you->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !you->meets_skill_requirements( built ) ) {
3334  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't work on this construction anymore." ), you->disp_name() );
3335  you->cancel_activity();
3336  if( you->is_npc() ) {
3337  you->activity = player_activity();
3338  you->set_moves( 0 );
3339  }
3340  return;
3341  }
3342  // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3343  // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6732000 )
3344  const int old_counter = pc->counter;
3345 
3346  // Base moves for construction with no speed modifier or assistants
3347  // Clamp to >= 100 to prevent division by 0 or int overflow on characters with high speed;
3348  const double base_total_moves = std::max( 100, built.time );
3349  // Current expected total moves, includes construction speed modifiers and assistants
3350  const double cur_total_moves = std::max( 100, built.adjusted_time() );
3351  // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed
3352  const double delta_progress = you->get_moves() * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3353  // Current progress in moves
3354  const double current_progress = old_counter * base_total_moves / 10000000.0 +
3355  delta_progress;
3356  // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3357  pc->counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10000000.0 );
3358 
3359  you->set_moves( 0 );
3360 
3361  pc->id->do_turn_special( here.bub_from_abs( act->placement ), *you );
3362  pc->counter = std::min( pc->counter, 10000000 );
3363  // If construction_progress has reached 100% or more
3364  if( pc->counter >= 10000000 ) {
3365  // Activity is canceled in complete_construction()
3366  complete_construction( you->as_character() );
3367  }
3368 }

3506 template<typename fn>
3507 static void cleanup_tiles( std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> &tiles, fn &cleanup )
3508 {
3509  auto it = tiles.begin();
3510  map &here = get_map();
3511  while( it != tiles.end() ) {
3512  auto current = it++;
3513 
3514  const tripoint_bub_ms &tile_loc = here.bub_from_abs( *current );
3515 
3516  if( cleanup( tile_loc ) ) {
3517  tiles.erase( current );
3518  }
3519  }
3520 }
3521 
3522 static void perform_zone_activity_turn(
3523  Character *you, const zone_type_id &ztype,
3524  const std::function<bool( const tripoint_bub_ms & )> &tile_filter,
3525  const std::function<void ( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms & )> &tile_action,
3526  const std::string &finished_msg )
3527 {
3528  const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3529  map &here = get_map();
3530  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = you->get_location();
3531  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> unsorted_tiles = mgr.get_near( ztype, abspos );
3532 
3533  cleanup_tiles( unsorted_tiles, tile_filter );
3534 
3535  // sort remaining tiles by distance
3536  const std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> &tiles =
3537  get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, unsorted_tiles );
3538 
3539  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &tile : tiles ) {
3540  const tripoint_bub_ms &tile_loc = here.bub_from_abs( tile );
3541 
3542  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route =
3543  here.route( you->pos_bub(), tile_loc, you->get_pathfinding_settings(),
3544  you->get_path_avoid() );
3545  if( route.size() > 1 ) {
3546  route.pop_back();
3547 
3548  you->set_destination( route, you->activity );
3549  you->activity.set_to_null();
3550  return;
3551  } else {
3552  // we are at destination already
3553  /* Perform action */
3554  tile_action( *you, tile_loc );
3555  if( you->get_moves() <= 0 ) {
3556  return;
3557  }
3558  }
3559  }
3560  add_msg( m_info, finished_msg );
3561  you->activity.set_to_null();
3562 }

3564 void activity_handlers::fertilize_plot_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3565 {
3566  itype_id fertilizer;
3567  auto check_fertilizer = [&]( bool ask_user = true ) -> void {
3568  if( act->str_values.empty() )
3569  {
3570  act->str_values.emplace_back( "" );
3571  }
3572  fertilizer = itype_id( act->str_values[0] );
3573 
3574  /* If unspecified, or if we're out of what we used before, ask */
3575  if( ask_user && ( fertilizer.is_empty() || !you->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 ) ) )
3576  {
3577  fertilizer = iexamine::choose_fertilizer( *you, "plant",
3578  false /* Don't confirm action with player */ );
3579  act->str_values[0] = fertilizer.str();
3580  }
3581  };
3582 
3583  auto have_fertilizer = [&]() {
3584  return !fertilizer.is_empty() && you->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
3585  };
3586 
3587  const auto reject_tile = [&]( const tripoint_bub_ms & tile ) {
3588  check_fertilizer();
3589  // TODO: fix point types
3590  ret_val<void> can_fert = iexamine::can_fertilize( *you, tile.raw(), fertilizer );
3591  return !can_fert.success();
3592  };
3593 
3594  const auto fertilize = [&]( Character & you, const tripoint_bub_ms & tile ) {
3595  check_fertilizer();
3596  if( have_fertilizer() ) {
3597  // TODO: fix point types
3598  iexamine::fertilize_plant( you, tile.raw(), fertilizer );
3599  if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
3600  add_msg( m_info, _( "You have run out of %s." ), item::nname( fertilizer ) );
3601  }
3602  }
3603  };
3604 
3605  check_fertilizer();
3606  if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
3607  act->set_to_null();
3608  return;
3609  }
3610 
3611  perform_zone_activity_turn( you,
3612  zone_type_FARM_PLOT,
3613  reject_tile,
3614  fertilize,
3615  _( "You fertilized every plot you could." ) );
3616 }

3636 void activity_handlers::robot_control_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3637 {
3638  act->set_to_null();
3639 
3640  if( act->monsters.empty() ) {
3641  debugmsg( "No monster assigned in ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL" );
3642  return;
3643  }
3644 
3645  shared_ptr_fast<monster> z = act->monsters[0].lock();
3646  act->monsters.clear();
3647 
3648  if( !z || !iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( you, *z ) ) {
3649  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "Target lost. IFF override failed." ) );
3650  return;
3651  }
3652 
3653  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unleash your override attack on the %s." ), z->name() );
3654 
3655  /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
3656  /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
3657  const float computer_skill = you->get_skill_level( skill_computer );
3658  const float randomized_skill = rng( 2, you->int_cur ) + computer_skill;
3659  float success = computer_skill - 3 * z->type->difficulty / randomized_skill;
3660  if( z->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
3661  success = randomized_skill - rng( 1, 11 );
3662  }
3663  // rideable mechs are not hostile, they have no AI, they do not resist control as much.
3664  if( success >= 0 ) {
3665  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully override the %s's IFF protocols!" ),
3666  z->name() );
3667  z->friendly = -1;
3668  if( z->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
3669  z->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
3670  }
3671  } else if( success >= -2 ) {
3672  //A near success
3673  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s short circuits as you attempt to reprogram it!" ), z->name() );
3674  //damage it a little
3675  z->apply_damage( you, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 1, 10 ) );
3676  if( z->is_dead() ) {
3677  you->practice( skill_computer, 10 );
3678  // Do not do the other effects if the robot died
3679  return;
3680  }
3681  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
3682  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "and turns friendly!" ) );
3683  //did the robot became friendly permanently?
3684  if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
3685  //it did
3686  z->friendly = -1;
3687  } else {
3688  // it didn't
3689  z->friendly = rng( 5, 40 );
3690  }
3691  }
3692  } else {
3693  you->add_msg_if_player( _( "but the robot refuses to acknowledge you as an ally!" ) );
3694  }
3695  you->practice( skill_computer, 10 );
3696 }

3709 void activity_handlers::tree_communion_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3710 {
3711  // There's an initial rooting process.
3712  if( act->values.front() > 0 ) {
3713  act->values.front() -= 1;
3714  if( act->values.front() == 0 ) {
3715  if( you->has_trait( trait_id( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) ) {
3716  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The ancient tree spirits answer your call." ) );
3717  } else {
3718  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your communion with the trees has begun." ) );
3719  }
3720  }
3721  return;
3722  }
3723  // Information is received every minute.
3724  if( !calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
3725  return;
3726  }
3727  // Breadth-first search forest tiles until one reveals new overmap tiles.
3728  std::queue<tripoint_abs_omt> q;
3729  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_omt> seen;
3730  tripoint_abs_omt loc = you->global_omt_location();
3731  q.push( loc );
3732  seen.insert( loc );
3733  const std::function<bool( const oter_id & )> filter = []( const oter_id & ter ) {
3734  return ter.obj().is_wooded() || ter.obj().get_name() == "field";
3735  };
3736  while( !q.empty() ) {
3737  tripoint_abs_omt tpt = q.front();
3738  if( overmap_buffer.reveal( tpt, 3, filter ) ) {
3739  if( you->has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) {
3740  you->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 2, 30, 8_hours, 6_hours );
3741  } else {
3742  you->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 1, 15, 2_hours, 1_hours );
3743  }
3744  if( one_in( 128 ) ) {
3745  if( one_in( 256 ) ) {
3746  if( you->has_effect( effect_social_dissatisfied ) ) {
3747  you->remove_effect( effect_social_dissatisfied );
3748  }
3749  if( ( you->has_flag( json_flag_SOCIAL1 ) || you->has_flag( json_flag_SOCIAL2 ) ) &&
3750  !you->has_effect( effect_social_satisfied ) ) {
3751  you->add_effect( effect_social_satisfied, 3_hours, false, 1 );
3752  }
3753  if( ( you->has_flag( json_flag_ASOCIAL1 ) || you->has_flag( json_flag_ASOCIAL2 ) ) &&
3754  !you->has_effect( effect_asocial_dissatisfied ) ) {
3755  you->add_effect( effect_asocial_dissatisfied, 3_hours, false, 1 );
3756  }
3757  }
3758  you->add_msg_if_player( "%s", SNIPPET.random_from_category( "tree_communion" ).value_or(
3759  translation() ) );
3760  }
3761  return;
3762  }
3763  for( const tripoint_abs_omt &neighbor : points_in_radius( tpt, 1 ) ) {
3764  if( seen.find( neighbor ) != seen.end() ) {
3765  continue;
3766  }
3767  seen.insert( neighbor );
3768  if( !overmap_buffer.ter( neighbor ).obj().is_wooded() ) {
3769  continue;
3770  }
3771  q.push( neighbor );
3772  }
3773  q.pop();
3774  }
3775  you->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The trees have shown you what they will." ) );
3776  act->set_to_null();
3777 }
3778 
3779 static void blood_magic( Character *you, int cost )
3780 {
3781  std::vector<uilist_entry> uile;
3782  std::vector<bodypart_id> parts;
3783  int i = 0;
3784  for( const bodypart_id &bp : you->get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3785  const int hp_cur = you->get_part_hp_cur( bp );
3786  uilist_entry entry( i, hp_cur > cost, i + 49, body_part_hp_bar_ui_text( bp ) );
3787 
3788  const std::pair<std::string, nc_color> &hp = get_hp_bar( hp_cur, you->get_part_hp_max( bp ) );
3789  entry.ctxt = colorize( hp.first, hp.second );
3790  uile.emplace_back( entry );
3791  parts.push_back( bp );
3792  i++;
3793  }
3794  int action = -1;
3795  while( action < 0 ) {
3796  action = uilist( _( "Choose part\nto draw blood from." ), uile );
3797  }
3798  you->mod_part_hp_cur( parts[action], - cost );
3799  you->mod_pain( std::max( 1, cost / 3 ) );
3800 }

3802 void activity_handlers::spellcasting_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3803 {
3804  act->set_to_null();
3805  const int level_override = act->get_value( 0 );
3806  spell_id sp( act->name );
3807 
3808  // if level is -1 then we know it's a player spell, otherwise we build it from the ground up
3809  spell temp_spell( sp );
3810  spell &spell_being_cast = ( level_override == -1 ) ? you->magic->get_spell( sp ) : temp_spell;
3811 
3812  // if level != 1 then we need to set the spell's level
3813  if( level_override != -1 ) {
3814  spell_being_cast.set_level( *you, level_override );
3815  }
3816 
3817  // choose target for spell before continuing
3818  const std::optional<tripoint> target = act->coords.empty() ? spell_being_cast.select_target(
3819  you ) : get_map().getlocal( act->coords.front() );
3820  if( target ) {
3821  // npcs check for target viability
3822  if( !you->is_npc() || spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( *you, *target ) ) {
3823  // no turning back now. it's all said and done.
3824  bool success = act->get_value( 1 ) == 1 ||
3825  rng_float( 0.0f, 1.0f ) >= spell_being_cast.spell_fail( *you );
3826  int exp_gained = spell_being_cast.casting_exp( *you );
3827  if( !success ) {
3828  you->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
3829  _( "You lose your concentration!" ) );
3830  if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level( *you ) && level_override == -1 ) {
3831  // still get some experience for trying
3832  spell_being_cast.gain_exp( *you, exp_gained / 5 );
3833  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained / 5,
3834  spell_being_cast.xp() );
3835  }
3836  get_event_bus().send<event_type::spellcasting_finish>( you->getID(), false, sp,
3837  spell_being_cast.spell_class(), spell_being_cast.get_difficulty( *you ),
3838  spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *you ), spell_being_cast.casting_time( *you ),
3839  spell_being_cast.damage( *you ) );
3840  return;
3841  }
3842 
3843  if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( spell_flag::VERBAL ) && !you->has_flag( json_flag_SILENT_SPELL ) ) {
3844  sounds::sound( you->pos(), you->get_shout_volume() / 2, sounds::sound_t::speech,
3845  _( "cast a spell" ),
3846  false );
3847  }
3848 
3849  you->add_msg_if_player( spell_being_cast.message(), spell_being_cast.name() );
3850 
3851  // this is here now so that the spell first consume its components then casts its effects, necessary to cast
3852  // spells with the components in hand.
3853  spell_being_cast.use_components( *you );
3854 
3855  // pay the cost. Allows ternaries based on having an effect or trait to calculate cost correctly
3856  int cost = spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *you );
3857 
3858  spell_being_cast.cast_all_effects( *you, *target );
3859 
3860  if( act->get_value( 2 ) != 0 ) {
3861  switch( spell_being_cast.energy_source() ) {
3862  case magic_energy_type::mana:
3863  you->magic->mod_mana( *you, -cost );
3864  break;
3865  case magic_energy_type::stamina:
3866  you->mod_stamina( -cost );
3867  break;
3868  case magic_energy_type::bionic:
3869  you->mod_power_level( -units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( cost ) ) );
3870  break;
3871  case magic_energy_type::hp:
3872  blood_magic( you, cost );
3873  break;
3874  case magic_energy_type::none:
3875  default:
3876  break;
3877  }
3878 
3879  }
3880  if( level_override == -1 ) {
3881  if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level( *you ) ) {
3882  // reap the reward
3883  int old_level = spell_being_cast.get_level();
3884  if( old_level == 0 ) {
3885  spell_being_cast.gain_level( *you );
3886  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
3887  _( "Something about how this spell works just clicked! You gained a level!" ) );
3888  } else {
3889  spell_being_cast.gain_exp( *you, exp_gained );
3890  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained,
3891  spell_being_cast.xp() );
3892  }
3893  if( spell_being_cast.get_level() != old_level ) {
3894  // Level 0-1 message is printed above - notify player when leveling up further
3895  if( old_level > 0 ) {
3896  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gained a level in %s!" ), spell_being_cast.name() );
3897  }
3898  }
3899  }
3900  }
3901  if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
3902  item *it = act->targets.front().get_item();
3903  if( it && !it->has_flag( flag_USE_PLAYER_ENERGY ) ) {
3904  you->consume_charges( *it, it->type->charges_to_use() );
3905  }
3906  }
3907  get_event_bus().send<event_type::spellcasting_finish>( you->getID(), true, sp,
3908  spell_being_cast.spell_class(), spell_being_cast.get_difficulty( *you ),
3909  spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *you ), spell_being_cast.casting_time( *you ),
3910  spell_being_cast.damage( *you ) );
3911  }
3912  }
3913 }
3914 
3915 void activity_handlers::study_spell_do_turn( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3916 {
3917  // Stop if there is not enough light to study
3918  if( you->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
3919  act->values[2] = -1;
3920  act->moves_left = 0;
3921  return;
3922  }
3923  // str_value 1 is "study" if we already know the spell, and want to study it more
3924  if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "study" ) {
3925  spell &studying = you->magic->get_spell( spell_id( act->name ) );
3926  // If we are studying to gain a level, keep studying until level changes
3927  if( act->get_str_value( 0 ) == "gain_level" ) {
3928  if( studying.get_level() < act->get_value( 1 ) ) {
3929  act->moves_left = 1000000;
3930  } else {
3931  act->moves_left = 0;
3932  }
3933  }
3934  const int old_level = studying.get_level();
3935  // Gain some experience from studying
3936  const int xp = roll_remainder( studying.exp_modifier( *you ) / to_turns<float>( 6_seconds ) );
3937  act->values[0] += xp;
3938  studying.gain_exp( *you, xp );
3939  bool leveled_up = you->practice( studying.skill(), xp, studying.get_difficulty( *you ), true );
3940  if( leveled_up &&
3941  studying.get_difficulty( *you ) < static_cast<int>( you->get_skill_level( studying.skill() ) ) ) {
3942  you->handle_skill_warning( studying.skill(),
3943  true ); // show the skill warning on level up, since we suppress it in practice() above
3944  }
3945  // Notify player if the spell leveled up
3946  if( studying.get_level() > old_level ) {
3947  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gained a level in %s!" ), studying.name() );
3948  }
3949  }
3950 }
3951 
3952 void activity_handlers::study_spell_finish( player_activity *act, Character *you )
3953 {
3954  act->set_to_null();
3955  const int total_exp_gained = act->get_value( 0 );
3956 
3957  if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "study" ) {
3958  you->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gained %i experience from your study session." ),
3959  total_exp_gained );
3960  } else if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "learn" && act->values[2] == 0 ) {
3961  you->magic->learn_spell( act->name, *you );
3962  }
3963  if( act->values[2] == -1 ) {
3964  you->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
3965  }
3966 }
